text: An intelligent system connected to the video surveillance in the terminal can be given parameters to search for the current or latest location of a vehicle or person in the terminal by being given the register plate, a photo of a person, or other such identifying data.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Privacy in Intelligent Video Surveillance System

**Description**: As a responsible developer, I want the intelligent video surveillance system to use identifying data such as vehicle registration plates or photos of individuals only with explicit consent and for clearly defined and limited purposes, ensuring that the privacy of individuals is respected and protected at all stages of data processing.

text: Terminal area and booking documents and booking app contains the help information (for different purposes broken down).
ethical_us:
**Title**: Clear and Comprehensive Help Information in Booking Systems

**Description**: As a user, I want the terminal area, booking documents, and booking app to contain detailed and easily understandable help information for different purposes so that I can clearly understand how to use these systems effectively and trust that I am making well-informed decisions.

text: Before a person with a vehicle enters the port, they are given explanation of what information will be handled, for example at the stage of making a reservation when they agree to give the necessary information of their vehicle.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Information Handling for Vehicle Entry at Port

**Description**: Before individuals enter the port with their vehicle, they should receive a clear explanation of what information will be collected and how it will be used. This explanation must be provided at the reservation stage, ensuring they fully understand and agree to share the necessary details about their vehicle.

text: A clear advertisement is placed on the booking document about the AI and data privacy.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Clear Advertisement on AI and Data Privacy

**Description**: As a user, I want a clear and easily understandable advertisement on the booking document that explains the use of AI technology and how my data privacy is being ensured, so that I am fully aware of and can trust the processes involved.

text: Data information policy is communicated at the service app/web page. Procedures in place for GDPR compliance and required steps are planned for example huge amount of user data request. For example redirection of resources or waiting times are clearly communicated.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Clear Communication of Data Information Policy and GDPR Compliance

**Description**: As a user, I want the data information policy to be clearly communicated on the service app/web page, ensuring procedures for GDPR compliance are transparent. Additionally, I want to be informed about the required steps and procedures for handling large amounts of user data requests, including any potential redirection of resources or expected waiting times.

text: No feature of the smart terminal or port must interfere in an unwanted way with any system in the passenger vehicles.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Prevent Unwanted Interference with Passenger Vehicle Systems

**Description**: As a developer, I want to ensure that no feature of the smart terminal or port interferes in an unwanted way with any system in passenger vehicles, so that we avoid causing any harm or disruption to vehicle operations, ensuring passengers' safety and well-being.

text: Car indentation system (digital, semi-automated, etc.) with control, navigation and markings is placed in the car deck to direct cars in line and to right places.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Safe and Efficient Vehicle Navigation on Car Deck

**Description**: As a developer, I want to implement a car indentation system with digital, semi-automated control, navigation, and markings to ensure vehicles are directed efficiently and safely to their designated spots on the car deck, thereby reducing the risk of accidents and improving overall organization and safety for all passengers.

text: The system has a reliable way to detect people sitting in a vehicle, that is in balance with respecting the privacy of passengers and adhering to border protocols
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Privacy in Occupant Detection System

**Description**: As a developer, I want to design the system to reliably detect people sitting in a vehicle while ensuring that the privacy of passengers is respected, so that the system adheres to border protocols without compromising individual privacy.

text: The system is transparent in its functioning and marks possible "uncertain" situations with timestamps or other identifying information
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure System Transparency and Flag Uncertain Situations

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to function transparently by marking any possible "uncertain" situations with timestamps or other identifying information, so that I can clearly understand and track when and where uncertainties occur, ensuring that the process remains transparent and trustworthy.

text: Car identification system is tested with right and wrong data and error handling is defined in the terminal action plan and terminal personnel is trained with error handling.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Responsible Error Handling in Car Identification System

**Description**: As a responsible developer, I want to ensure that the car identification system is tested with both correct and incorrect data, and that comprehensive error handling procedures are defined and integrated into the terminal action plan. Additionally, I want to ensure that terminal personnel are adequately trained in error handling protocols to ensure accountability, integrity, and reliability in system operations.

text: The data tied to a person can be found and is eraseable in the system upon request.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Right to Data Erasure 

**Description**: As a user, I want to ensure that any data tied to me can be easily located and permanently erased from the system upon my request, so that my privacy is respected and my personal information is not kept without my consent.

text: Smart terminal area is defined in the blueprints of the SMARTER project with responsibilities and roles.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Define Clear Responsibilities and Roles for the Smart Terminal Area

**Description**: As part of the SMARTER project, the smart terminal area must have clearly defined responsibilities and roles articulated in the blueprints. This ensures that all stakeholders understand their obligations and are held accountable, fostering an environment of integrity and responsible behavior.

text: The data storing and collecting follows the GDPR regulations and identifying data is anonymized or destroyed within the legal time frame.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Compliance with GDPR for Data Storage and Collection

**Description**: As a responsible AI system, we ensure that all data collection and storage practices comply with GDPR regulations by anonymizing or destroying personally identifying information within the legally mandated time frame to safeguard individuals' privacy.

text: Before being able to finish purchasing tickets, the passenger is required to accept the terms and conditions of using the smart terminal and having the minimum required data collected.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Passenger Informed Consent

**Description**: As a passenger using the smart terminal, I want clear and understandable information regarding the terms and conditions, as well as the data collection practices, so that I can make an informed decision and provide my explicit consent before completing my ticket purchase.

text: Communication plan has a section about on-time communication for different logistical purposes towards car carriers
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Communication for Car Carrier Logistics

**Description**: Ensure that the communication plan for car carrier logistics includes a section dedicated to on-time communication for various logistical purposes. This will provide clear, understandable, and timely information to all stakeholders, fostering transparency in the logistics process.

text: Data consent lifecycle is defined in the SMART terminal blueprints.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Define Data Consent Lifecycle 

**Description**: Ensure that the SMART terminal blueprints include a well-defined data consent lifecycle to protect the privacy of individuals. This should detail how consent is obtained, updated, and managed over time, guaranteeing that user data is only used in ways that have been explicitly permitted by the individuals.

text: Harbor area will have clear signs of the data requirities and visualize the flow of events.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Clear Signage and Visualization of Data Requirements in Harbor Area

**Description**: As a user, I want the harbor area to have clear signs indicating data requirements and visualizations of the flow of events, so that I can understand the processes, requirements, and data flow easily. This ensures transparency and helps in making informed decisions about my interactions with the harbor's systems and services.

text: The boarding process is as similar to what it used to be as possible, or even simpler. Any and all instructions are crystal clear so that the passengers are able to proceed without asking for assistance as often as possible.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent and Understandable Boarding Process  

**Description**: As a passenger, I want the boarding process to be as similar to the traditional process as possible or even simpler, with crystal-clear instructions. This ensures that I can follow the steps independently without needing to ask for assistance frequently, fostering transparency and understanding of the boarding procedure.

text: Action plan for personnels in terms of delays are embedded into the logistics plan and it will have a section on human behaviour with smart system delays and actions preventing misbehaviour on passsengers.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Integrating Action Plans for Delay Management in Logistics

**Description**: To benefit passengers and staff by incorporating detailed action plans for personnel management in the event of delays into the logistics plan. This section will highlight human behavior, smart system delays, and proactive measures to prevent misbehavior among passengers, ensuring that the system works smoothly and humanely during disruptions.

text: The system can display capacity information for passengers that access the service remotely and at the port, display terminals can also provide these types of information for passengers.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Provide Transparent Capacity Information for Passengers

**Description**: As a user accessing the service remotely or at the port, I want the system to clearly display capacity information through both online platforms and display terminals, so I can make informed decisions about my travel plans based on the current availability data.

text: Clear logs that shows the state of the system and provide appropriate feedback and APIs that can improve system integration.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Establish Transparent System Logging and API Feedback

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to maintain clear and accessible logs that reflect the current state of the system and provide actionable feedback via APIs. This will ensure transparency and facilitate better understanding and integration of the system's operations and performance.

text: Technical data of the camera is communicated to developers and also to wider audience in order to built trust on the system as a whole
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent Communication of Camera Technical Data

**Description**: As a stakeholder, I want the technical data of the camera to be communicated clearly to both developers and the wider audience, so that trust in the system's reliability and security can be established and maintained.

text: Different use cases in passenger flows are modeled and communicated to all needed participants torugh the development lifecycle.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Communication of Passenger Flow Models

**Description**: Ensure that all use cases in passenger flows are clearly modeled and communicated to all relevant participants throughout the development lifecycle, promoting transparency and understanding of the AI processes involved.

text: Passengers are instructed to clear their register plates before arriving to the terminal. An employee is still present to resolve problem situations (e.g. to quickly clean the register plate if needed). Accidents are handled as they currently are when two human drivers are involved. For accident situations with smart vehicles, accountability is also determined by the smart vehicle's accountability.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Accountability for Smart Vehicle Accidents

**Description**: As part of our commitment to the principle of responsibility, passengers using smart vehicles are required to clear their register plates before arriving at the terminal. This helps ensure clarity in identifying vehicles. Despite this automation, an employee will be present to assist in resolving any issues, such as dirty register plates. In the event of an accident involving smart vehicles, accountability will be determined similarly to accidents between human drivers, ensuring that the smart vehicle's accountability mechanisms are also considered. This ensures that all parties understand their responsibilities and are held accountable for their actions.

text: If the terminal interacts with smart vehicles, it must be in a way that does not compromise the safety of either party. There must be clear limits to what data is shared and what permissions the systems have for information exchange.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Privacy in Smart Vehicle Interactions

**Description**: As an ethical developer, I want the terminal to interact with smart vehicles in a way that respects privacy by clearly defining and limiting the data shared and the permissions for information exchange, so that the privacy of both parties is maintained.

text: Smart harborfollows a protocol on traditional cars and a smart vehicles when developing the flow of events from harbor entering to entering to the ship.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Equitable Treatment in Harbor Protocol for Traditional and Smart Vehicles

**Description**: As a system designer of the Smart Harbor, I want to ensure that the protocol for processing both traditional cars and smart vehicles follows an equitable flow of events from entering the harbor to boarding the ship. This is to guarantee that all vehicles, regardless of their technological advancements, are treated fairly and without discrimination.

text: Boarding pass on cars are shared with instructions for different vehicles.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Communication of Boarding Pass Instructions

**Description**: As users of a shared transport service, individuals should receive clear, detailed, and understandable instructions for boarding passes specific to different vehicles. This ensures they have the necessary information to make informed decisions and navigate the system efficiently.

text: The system can provide a standby system in place should the traffic lights fail or a human traffic warden that will help direct traffic for ship loading and unloading.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Implementation of Fail-safe Traffic Management System

 **Description**: As an ethical engineer, I want to ensure that there is a robust fail-safe system in place, such as a standby system or a human traffic warden, to manage traffic during ship loading and unloading. This measure ensures that the responsibility is taken to maintain efficient and safe traffic flow, thereby mitigating the risk of accidents and operational disruptions in case of traffic light failures.

text: Digital scanners that synchronize passenger information with regulations such as alcohol limits that can be brought in and to ensure that drunk or underage passengers are not driving.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Passenger Safety with Digital Scanners

**Description**: As a system designer, I want to integrate digital scanners that synchronize passenger information with regulations, such as alcohol limits and age restrictions, to ensure that drunk or underage passengers are not driving, thereby preventing harm and promoting the safety of all passengers and others on the road.

text: The system can provide a standby system in place should the traffic lights fail or a human traffic warden that will help direct traffic for ship loading and unloading.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Safety in Traffic Management for Ship Loading and Unloading

**Description**: As a system designer, I want to ensure that there is a standby system, such as a backup traffic signal or a human traffic warden, in place to manage traffic effectively during ship loading and unloading operations. This is to prevent accidents, confusion, and potential harm that could result from a failure of the primary traffic signal system, thereby adhering to the principle of non-maleficence by avoiding harm to individuals.

text: Regular digital or even manual information system checks with prompts informing on current updates such as parking information, duration of parking, etc.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent Communication of Parking Information Updates

**Description**: As a system user, I want regular digital or manual checks of the information system to send prompts informing me of current updates such as parking information and duration. This will ensure transparency, allowing me to understand the status and changes promptly and clearly.

text: Digital verification devices such as number plate scanners for vehicles to ensure that vehicle is authentic and in line with regulations and biometic scanner for human passengers.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Trust Through Accurate and Secure Digital Verification

**Description**: As a developer, I want to design digital verification devices, such as number plate scanners for vehicles and biometric scanners for human passengers, that are accurate, reliable, and secure in order to foster trust among users. This means implementing rigorous testing and data protection measures to ensure that these devices work effectively, protect personal data, and comply with all relevant regulations.

text: APIs and Interoperable systems that can provide accurate data records from different teriminals and can synchronize efficiently with the ports System
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent Data Synchronization and Interoperability

**Description**: As a developer, I want to design APIs and interoperable systems that provide accurate and transparent data records from different terminals and synchronize efficiently with the ports system. This transparency will allow stakeholders to clearly understand data flows and system interactions, ensuring confidence in the integrity and reliability of the data exchanged.

text: System provides clear and transparent information without any ambiguity at remote terminals and at digital terminals and with people who check in passengers at the port.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Communication at All Passenger Checkpoints 

**Description**: As an ethical requirement, the system must provide clear and transparent information without any ambiguity to passengers at remote terminals, digital terminals, and through personnel who check them in at the port. This ensures that passengers receive understandable and accurate information, fostering transparency and trust throughout the check-in process.

text: AI integrated into the system that can help identify data patterns for users with special needs and provide necessary information.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Fair Accessibility through AI Integration

**Description**: As a developer, I want to integrate AI into the system to help identify data patterns for users with special needs and provide them with necessary information in a fair and unbiased manner, ensuring that the AI does not discriminate against any group, thereby promoting justice and equity.

text: A clear and well defined HCI system where voice can be used to communicate data consent in line with relevant regulations.
ethical_us:
**Title**: User Consent Through Voice-activated HCI System

**Description**: As a user, I want to communicate my data consent using a clear and well-defined voice-activated Human-Computer Interaction (HCI) system, ensuring that my privacy is protected and my consent aligns with relevant regulations.

text: A centralized data management system with clearly outlined details on access rights and clear logs on users.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Data Management System Access and Logging

**Description**: As a user, I want a centralized data management system to clearly outline access rights and maintain detailed logs of user activities so that I can understand who has access to data and how it is being used.

text: Booking information does not exclude anyone from the needed identification information and the booking application has the identification information as a mandatory field.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Inclusive Identification Requirement for Booking Information

**Description**: As a developer, I want to ensure that the booking application requires identification information as a mandatory field for all users, ensuring that no one is excluded from providing the necessary identification information. This design will promote justice and fairness by treating all users equally and preventing any form of discrimination or exclusion.

text: Ensure the quality of the data by testing. Testing at least with race, gender, age should be done and variance between gropes should not be significant. Realtime testing in real context needs to be done before launch.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Quality and Fairness of Data Testing

**Description**: As a requirement for ensuring justice and fairness in AI systems, the data must be rigorously tested for quality by examining its performance against different demographic groups including race, gender, and age. Any significant variance in outcomes between these groups should be identified and addressed. Additionally, real-time testing in real-world contexts should be conducted prior to the official launch to ensure equitable performance across diverse populations.

text: I while shopping in the termina I lost track of time and I need to locate my self in the terminal. Mobile app or feature in terminal enduser app for navigation. System has Opt-in policy. Treminal has tracking points, sensors or QR code to provide tracing of the users movements and provide indor navigation to desired points.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Opt-In Indoor Navigation for Lost Shoppers

**Description**: As a user, I want to opt-in to utilize an app that leverages tracking points, sensors, or QR codes within the terminal to help me navigate and locate myself when I lose track of time, ensuring that my autonomy and freedom of choice are respected throughout the process.

text: When auditing is in process system need to provide detailed documentation in every level of system architecture. Also 3rd party components needs to be documented or at least links to those systems documentation needs to Available.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Transparency Through Comprehensive Documentation During Audits

**Description**: As an ethical requirement to uphold transparency, the system must provide detailed documentation at every level of its architecture during the auditing process. Additionally, any third-party components used within the system must be documented, or at the very least, links to their respective documentation should be made available. This ensures that all aspects of the system are understandable and traceable, facilitating transparent and thorough audits.

text: System needs to provide process documentation and specs for new service joining the system. List of acceptable actions should be given. E.g. are there restrictions of data usage, bandwidth, number of API queries
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent Documentation and Guidelines for New Services

**Description**: As part of introducing a new service into the system, comprehensive process documentation and specifications must be provided. This includes a clear list of acceptable actions, any restrictions on data usage, bandwidth, and the number of API queries. This transparency will ensure that all stakeholders understand the operational boundaries and features of the new service, fostering trust and enabling informed decision-making.

text: System needs to provide user friendly and short description of the traceability features of the service and also provide instructions to take acting to access traceability. System needs also be able to end user notifications on traceability if user wishes
ethical_us:
**Title**: Enhance Traceability Feature Accessibility and Communication

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to offer a user-friendly and concise description of its traceability features, along with clear instructions on how to access these features, to ensure I can easily understand and utilize them. Additionally, the system should provide an option for end-user notifications regarding traceability if the user wishes, maintaining high transparency and effective communication about the traceability process.

text: Smart terminal system need to have API for BI tool so that the service provider can track the service usage.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent Service Usage Tracking for Service Providers  
**Description**: To promote transparency, the smart terminal system should include an API for the BI tool that allows service providers to track and monitor service usage effectively. This API should provide clear, comprehensive, and easily understandable data regarding the service usage, ensuring that service providers can accurately assess performance and make informed decisions.

text: System should create explicit action log of its actions. The logs should be accessible for Designated personnel and understandable or reliably interpretable for government or other officials who require the logs for a legitimate reason.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Action Log Transparency

**Description**: As a system user, I want the system to create an explicit action log of its actions, which should be accessible to designated personnel and understandable or reliably interpretable by government or other officials, to ensure transparency and accountability in its operations.

text: Systems identifies users with special need and  has feature to inform terminal service provider of required help. Systems also need to be available to tract special need aids inside the Terminal.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Facilitate Access for Users with Special Needs

**Description**: As a system provider, I want our system to identify users with special needs and inform terminal service providers about the required assistance, as well as track the availability and location of special need aids within the terminal. This ensures that users with special needs receive timely and appropriate help, thereby benefitting them and promoting an inclusive and supportive environment.

text: AI system needs to have a function to generate an explanation for its actions if requested by a system administrator with rights to access the System.
ethical_us:
**Title**: System Explanation Function for Administrators

**Description**: As a system administrator with authorized access, I want the AI system to generate clear explanations for its actions when requested, ensuring transparency and comprehensibility of its operations.

text: Function level documentation needs to be in Place.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Comprehensive Function Level Documentation

**Description**: As a user or stakeholder, I want comprehensive function-level documentation to be available and accessible, so that the workings and decisions made by the AI system are transparent and easily understandable. This will help in building trust and allow for better oversight and accountability.

text: System needs to be tested with given number of versatile use cases and not only obvious use cases with acceptable results. Also, those cases that would be possible but not testes should be clary stated.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Comprehensive and Transparent System Testing

**Description**: As a system developer, I want to ensure that the system is tested with a wide range of versatile use cases, not just the obvious ones, to build and maintain trust with users. Additionally, I will clearly document and communicate the use cases that were not tested but could be possible, ensuring transparency and fostering user trust in the system's reliability and thoroughness.

text: When planning my budget for freighting my  goods, i would like clear information on the different pricing options (aggregated prices) maybe in an app, sites or displayboards at the terminal to help me plan my budget effectively.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Freight Pricing Information 

**Description**: As a user planning my budget for freighting my goods, I need clear and accessible information about different pricing options—whether through an app, websites, or display boards at the terminal—to enable effective and informed budget planning.

text: clear and well defined pricing criteria such as pricing analysis for customers on the system.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Pricing Criteria for Customers

**Description**: As a customer, I want the system to provide clear and well-defined pricing criteria, including a detailed pricing analysis, so that I can understand how prices are determined and make informed purchasing decisions.

text: When making inquiries as a customer, are there  pointers to say you are communicating with a virtual assistant and is there provision for a human assistant where possible?
ethical_us:
**Title**: Indication of Virtual Assistant Interaction

**Description**: As a customer, I should be clearly informed when I am communicating with a virtual assistant to ensure transparency. Additionally, there should be an option to switch to a human assistant where possible to maintain clear and honest communication about the nature of the interaction.

text: When asked system documentation need to have description on what kind of data and from where was used to teach the system. Data set with out clear description should not be used.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Detailed Documentation of AI Training Data

**Description**: As a user, I need the system documentation to include a clear description of the types of data used and their sources for training the AI, ensuring that datasets lacking clear descriptions are excluded. This contributes to the transparency of the AI technology by allowing users to understand the origins and nature of the data used, fostering trust and accountability.

text: In service critical or human relating features only explainable AI/ML solutions are used. When requested the system can provide reasoning behind given result.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Explainable AI for Critical and Human-Centric Systems

**Description**: As a user, I want to ensure that AI/ML solutions used in service-critical or human-related features are explainable, so that I can understand the reasoning behind the results when requested, promoting transparency and trust in the system.

text: When prompted by passengers, the system should be able to provide information requested, eg customer asking for summary on a trip should be able to get one from the system.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Provide Clear and Comprehensive Information to Passengers

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to transparently provide accurate and understandable information about my trip, such as a summary, when requested, ensuring that I am fully informed about the details and processes affecting my travel experience.

text: Before implementation, there should be a way to verify that the system is following the best practices and aligned with required legal Standards.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Verification of Compliance with Best Practices and Legal Standards

**Description**: As a responsible developer, I want to implement a verification mechanism before rolling out the system, ensuring that it aligns with best practices and adheres to required legal standards, so that we maintain accountability and uphold our integrity.

text: A detailed document explaining the extent of the system's data use should be prepared and available to customers upon request.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparency through Detailed Data Use Documentation

**Description**: As a system provider, I want to prepare a detailed document explaining the extent of the system's data use, so that it is available to customers upon request, ensuring transparency in how their data is managed.

text: The user is offered an easy to read statement of data privacy policies excercised with the terminal services for the services she is using (off the app) . She can opt in and out of data collection not necessary for my need of services.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Clear Data Privacy Policies and Opt-In/Out Options

**Description**: As a user, I want to be provided with an easy-to-read statement of the data privacy policies related to the terminal services I am using, so that I can understand how my data is being collected and utilized. Additionally, I want to have the ability to opt in and out of data collection practices that are not necessary for the essential services I am using, ensuring transparency in data handling practices.

text: System provides Data collection description and  Data restrictions. Relevant contact information. Way to notify errors
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparency in Data Collection and Usage

**Description**: The system must provide clear and comprehensive information about data collection processes, data usage restrictions, and relevant contact information for inquiries. Additionally, the system should offer an accessible way for users to report errors or inconsistencies, ensuring transparency and fostering trust.

text: Clear security communication to passengers who intend to use the terminal services, about what data is collected and how it is used.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Security Communication to Passengers

**Description**: As an airport authority, we want to clearly communicate to passengers who intend to use the terminal services about what data is collected and how it is used, ensuring that the information is easily understandable and accessible, so that passengers are fully aware and informed about the security processes and their data usage.

text: Video recordings and such unanonymized identifying data are only available to few certified people
ethical_us:
**Title**: Controlled Access to Identifying Data

**Description**: As a system administrator, I want video recordings and other unanonymized identifying data to be accessible only to a select group of certified personnel, ensuring the privacy of individuals' personal data is protected and unauthorized access is prevented.

text: A register of personal data processing activities and their justification (basis for processing) is created, all involved parties are identified and this register is maintained and made available for needing parties.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Maintain and Transparently Share Data Processing Register

**Description**: As a responsible AI organization, we will create, maintain, and share a detailed register of personal data processing activities. This register will include justifications for processing, identification of all involved parties, and will be readily available to parties with legitimate needs. This ensures accountability, transparency, and integrity by making the data processing activities clear and accessible.

text: The data privacy notice is made available to the passenger (via the app she is using), which provides the purposes the personal data is used For.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Provide Data Privacy Notice to Passengers

**Description**: As a passenger using the app, I want to receive a clear and comprehensive data privacy notice that outlines the purposes for which my personal data is used, so that I can have transparency about how my information will be handled.

text: Use case coordinator has detailed plan of the  systems and components contributing to the smart terminal system and also disclosure from those parties if they need GDPR clearances.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Comprehensive Coordination and GDPR Compliance in Smart Terminal Systems

**Description**: As a use case coordinator, I need to have a detailed plan of systems and components contributing to the smart terminal system, including disclosures from those parties regarding the necessity of GDPR clearances, to ensure responsible management, accountability, and adherence to data protection regulations.

text: The value add application the passenger is using needs to impelent a control which identifies, which data processing activities are necessary for which basic or added value services the user is considering to use and she can thus opt in or out of the service based on the data processed. The data the user has selected for her rights execution needs to be processed accordingly, e.g. anonymized, deleted or made available for the user to transfer to another service/download.
ethical_us:
**Title**: User-Controlled Data Processing for Value-Added Services

**Description**: As a passenger using the value-add application, I want to know which data processing activities are necessary for the basic and added value services I consider using. This way, I can make an informed decision to opt in or out of these services based on the data processed. Additionally, I want the application to respect my choices for data handling (e.g., anonymize, delete, or make available for transfer/download), ensuring my freedom and autonomy over my personal data.

text: Data statements need to be available and also  descriptions what services optional and how to opt—out on those need to be implanted. Description of what parts of the system are used by harbor official and cannot by opt-outed.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparency in Data Usage and Service Options

**Description**: Provide clear and accessible information for users regarding data statements, including detailed descriptions of optional services and instructions on how to opt-out. Additionally, ensure that there is a transparent explanation of which parts of the system are mandatory (e.g., used by harbor officials) and not subject to opt-out to enhance user understanding and build trust.

text: System architecture needs to be draw and it needs to be shareable with relevant stakeholders. Possible security issues relating to architecture information sharing needs to be Mitigated.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Sharing of System Architecture

**Description**: Ensure that the system architecture is clearly drawn and made shareable with relevant stakeholders, enhancing transparency. At the same time, implement measures to mitigate possible security issues related to the sharing of architecture information, maintaining a balance between openness and protection.

text: The system can notify users on their tickets and display boards that data being collected are used in line with GDPR. Also regular tesing and security checks to ensure that customer data are not being jeopardized.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparency in Data Collection and Security Notifications

**Description**: As a responsible organisation, we will notify users on their tickets and display boards that their data is being collected and used in accordance with GDPR. Additionally, we will conduct regular testing and security checks to ensure that customer data is not being jeopardized, thereby promoting transparency in our data practices.

text: Other forms of biometrics such as iris or finger print recognition as an alternative to facial Recogniton.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Alternative Biometric Options for Enhanced Privacy

**Description**: As a system designer, I want to provide alternative biometric options such as iris or fingerprint recognition in addition to facial recognition, so that users can have more control over their personal data and choose the method they are most comfortable with, thereby enhancing their privacy.

**Description**: As part of our commitment to transparency, the system will record and log any lead processing event that exceeds 25 seconds, including the duration of the event. This ensures that we can track, understand, and communicate the performance of our system to users and stakeholders.

text: The product shall protect the identity of the players. The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Protect Player Identity and Privacy

**Description**: As a user, the product shall ensure my identity remains confidential, and it shall ensure I do not have access to any information that could reveal the identity of other players. This protects the privacy of all players involved and safeguards personal data from unnecessary exposure.

text: The product shall be available to players who understand English, Spanish and French. The product shall allow the user to select the language upon accessing the product.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Language Inclusivity for Equitable Access  
**Description**: As a user, I should be able to select my preferred language (English, Spanish, or French) upon accessing the product to ensure fair and equitable access regardless of my language proficiency, thereby promoting justice and fairness across diverse user groups.

text: The system shall have high availability every day of the year. The system must be available for use between 12:00AM and 6:00PM all days of the year.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring High Availability and Reliability

**Description**: As an organization responsible for the AI system, we must ensure the system is available and reliable every day of the year, specifically from 12:00AM to 6:00PM. This commitment to high availability directly reflects our accountability and integrity, fostering user trust by maintaining reliable access and service continuity.

text: The product shall provide GUI based Monitoring Services. System Administrators shall monitor message exchanges will predict and determine problems and will also provide internal and external support.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparency in Monitoring Services

**Description**: As a system administrator, I need the GUI-based monitoring services to clearly explain and document all the message exchanges, so that I can predict and determine problems with complete transparency. This includes clear communication and understanding of how data is being processed and monitored, ensuring that all stakeholders are aware of the monitoring activities, thus fostering an environment of transparency and trust.

text: The product shall be available 99% of the time. Rationale: To avoid service interruption during busiest customer service response periods. The product shall be available 99.99% of the time for regular business days.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure High Availability for Critical Service Periods

**Description**: As an ethical business organization, we shall ensure that our product is available 99% of the time, particularly during the busiest customer service response periods, and 99.99% of the time during regular business days. This commitment reflects our responsibility to our users to provide a reliable and uninterrupted service, thereby maintaining trust and accountability.

text: The product shall information Security. The product shall enable privacy by encryption WS-Security and Integrity Checking
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Trust through Information Security and Privacy Measures

**Description**: As a user, I need the product to incorporate robust information security practices and enable privacy through the use of encryption (WS-Security) and integrity checking, so that I can trust that my data is secure and protected from unauthorized access or tampering.

text: The product shall have audit capabilities.The product shall store messages for a minimum of one year for audit and transaction tracking purposes.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Audit Capabilities for Transparent Tracking

**Description**: As an end-user concerned about transparency, I want the product to have robust audit capabilities and the capability to store messages for a minimum of one year. This ensures that all transactions can be tracked and reviewed, fostering a transparent environment where actions are traceable and accountable.

text: All changes  updates  and additions to the WCS system shall be updated in the WCS Developer and WCS User Guides. Every change must be reflected in WCS system documentation
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Documentation Transparency for WCS Updates

**Description**: To uphold the principle of transparency, all changes, updates, and additions to the WCS (Warehouse Control System) shall be meticulously documented in the WCS Developer and WCS User Guides. Every modification must be clearly reflected in the system documentation to ensure that all stakeholders are fully informed and can understand the changes made.

text: The system shall display and embed in each message a date/timestamp of when the message was sent.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Timestamp Transparency in Messaging System

**Description**: As a user, I want each message to display an embedded date/timestamp of when it was sent, so that communication is transparent and I can understand the timing and sequence of messages accurately.

text: All network transactions that involve financial information or personally identifiable information shall be encrypted.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure Encryption for Financial and Personal Transactions

**Description**: As a user, I want all network transactions that involve financial information or personally identifiable information to be encrypted, so that I can trust my sensitive data is protected against unauthorized access and breaches.

text: System use shall not cause any harm to human users.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure No Harm to Human Users

**Description**: As an ethical AI developer, I want to ensure that the system use shall not cause any harm to human users, so that we adhere to the principle of non-maleficence and avoid causing any negative impact on individuals' well-being and safety.

text: The system should warn ECA users about the malfunction of the system.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Warn ECA Users About System Malfunctions 

**Description**: As a user of the ECA system, I want to receive timely warnings about any malfunctions within the system so that I can avoid potential harm and take appropriate action to ensure my safety and the safety of my data.

text: The system shall provide multi language support.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Multi-Language Support to Uphold User Dignity

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to provide multi-language support so that I can access and use the system in my preferred language, ensuring that my inherent worth and rights are respected, regardless of my linguistic background.

text: The system shall refresh the display every 60 seconds.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Trusted and Reliable Display Refresh  

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to refresh the display every 60 seconds to ensure that the information presented is accurate and up-to-date, which builds trust in the system's reliability and effectiveness.

text: The application shall match the color of the schema set forth by Department of Homeland Security
ethical_us:

**Description**: As a developer, I want the application to match the color schemes specified by the Department of Homeland Security, ensuring transparency in compliance with regulatory requirements and allowing users to understand the rationale behind the color choices. This promotes trust and demonstrates responsibility by adhering to established standards.

text: If projected  the data must be readable.  On a 10x10 projection screen  90% of viewers must be able to read Event / Activity data from a viewing distance of 30
ethical_us:

**Description**: As an ethical developer, I want to ensure that the data projected on a 10x10 screen is readable from a viewing distance of 30 feet by 90% of the audience, so that the information is accessible, understandable, and fair to all viewers, promoting transparency and respect for human dignity.

text: The product shall be available during normal business hours. As long as the user has access to the client PC  the system will be available 99% of the time during the first six months of operation.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure System Availability During Business Hours

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to be available 99% of the time during normal business hours for the first six months of operation, so I can rely on it for consistent and uninterrupted access, promoting trust and responsibility in the service provided. This availability ensures that I can work efficiently without worrying about system downtimes, supporting my autonomy and professional dignity.

text: If projected  the data must be understandable. On a 10x10 projection screen  90% of viewers must be able to determine that Events or Activities are occuring in current time from a viewing distance of 100
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Understandable Data Projection for Real-Time Events

**Description**: As part of our commitment to transparency and trust, the data projected on a 10x10 screen must be clear and comprehensible from a viewing distance of 100 yards. This ensures that at least 90% of viewers can accurately determine that events or activities are occurring in real-time, thus facilitating better communication and understanding.

text: The product shall respond fast to keep up-to-date data in the display.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Responsiveness for Accurate and Real-Time Data Display

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to respond quickly and update the data displayed in real-time, so I can trust the accuracy and timeliness of the information provided, ensuring decisions made based on this data are well-informed and up-to-date.

text: The system shall have a MDI form that allows for the viewing of the graph and the data table.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Data Visualization Interface

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to provide a Multi-Document Interface (MDI) form that allows for the simultaneous viewing of both the graph and the data table, ensuring that data transparency is maintained and I can easily understand and verify the information presented.

text: The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Display of Events  
**Description**: As a user, I want the system to display events in a vertical table by time so that I can easily understand and follow the sequence of events in an organized manner. Ensuring the transparent presentation of information will help me make informed decisions based on clear and understandable data. This aligns with the principle of transparency by making information accessible and straightforward to users.

text: The system shall display the Events in a graph by time.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Visualization of Events Over Time with Enhanced Transparency

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to display events in a graph by time, ensuring that the visual representation is transparent and understandable. This includes providing clear legends, labels, and explanations for the data sources and methodologies used, enabling users to fully grasp how the data is organized and presented.

text: The system shall display Events or Activities.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent and Fair Display of Events or Activities

**Description**: As a responsible system, it shall display Events or Activities in a manner that is transparent, ensuring users understand the criteria for display. Additionally, it will ensure that the selection and display of these events or activities are conducted in a fair manner, free from discrimination or bias, maintaining users' trust and promoting justice and fairness.

text: The display shall have two regions:  left 2/3 of the display is graphical  right 1/3 of the display is a data table
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Equitable Display Design

**Description**: As a user, I need a display that ensures fair and just presentation of information, where the left 2/3 of the display is graphical and the right 1/3 of the display is a data table, so that the information is easy to comprehend for diverse users, respects their dignity, and does not perpetuate any discrimination or unfair bias when accessing and interpreting the information.

text: The data displayed in both the nodes within the graph and the rows in the table are MSEL Summary data
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparency in Data Representation

**Description**: As a user, I want the data displayed in both the nodes within the graph and the rows in the table to be the MSEL Summary data, so that I can transparently understand and verify the information being presented, ensuring the system’s integrity and fostering trust.

text: The table side of the display shall be split into 2 regions: sequential and temporal.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Clear and Understandable Visual Segmentation

**Description**: As a user, I want the table side of the display to be split into two distinct regions—sequential and temporal—so that I can easily understand and interpret the data presented without confusion, fostering transparency and trust in the system.

text: The top 1/4 of the table will hold events that are to occur sequentially.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Sequential Execution of Events in Top Quarter of Table

**Description**: As a developer, I want to ensure that events positioned in the top quarter of the table occur sequentially to maintain consistency, reliability, and trust in the system’s behavior. This should be implemented in a way that preserves transparency, avoids potential harm, and ensures fair and understandable outcomes for all users.

text: The bottom 3/4 of the table will hold events that occur according to its relevance to current time.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Display Relevant Events Ethically 

**Description**: As a user, I want the bottom 3/4 of the table to display events according to their relevance to the current time, ensuring that the events shown are accurate, non-biased, and do not harm or mislead users. This includes implementing proper measures to protect user privacy, maintain transparency about event relevance criteria, and ensure fairness in event selection. The goal is to provide a beneficial and trustworthy experience, respecting user autonomy and promoting informed decision-making.

text: The system shall color code events according to their variance from current time.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Non-Misleading Color Coding for Event Timing

**Description**: As a developer, I want to ensure the color coding of events according to their variance from the current time is clear and easily understandable, so users can accurately interpret the timing of events without any confusion or misinterpretation.

text: The system shall display data from the Sync Matrix 1.0 and Exercise Management Tool 1.0 applications
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparency and Trust in Data Display

**Description**: As a user of the system, I need the data displayed from the Sync Matrix 1.0 and Exercise Management Tool 1.0 applications to be presented in a transparent manner. This includes clear labeling of data sources, explainability of how data integration is performed, and assurance of data accuracy and integrity. This will help build trust in the system by demonstrating accountable and reliable data handling practices.

text: The system shall link Events back to either the Sync Matrix 1.0 or the Exercise Managment Tool 1.0 applications for modifications.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Linking of Events for System Modifications

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to link Events back to either the Sync Matrix 1.0 or the Exercise Management Tool 1.0 applications for modifications to ensure transparency and responsibility. By enabling clear and accountable connections between the events and the applications, users can make informed decisions and adhere to ethical standards, ensuring that the system modifications are traceable and verifiable.

text: The system shall allow modification of the display.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Personalization while Maintaining User Trust

**Description**: As a user, I want to modify the display settings of the system so that I can personalize it to my preferences, while ensuring that my data is protected and the system remains transparent and trustworthy.

text: The system shall filter data by: Venues and Key Events.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Filtering of Data by Venues and Key Events

**Description**: Design the system to ensure that data filtering by venues and key events is transparent and easy to understand, guaranteeing user privacy and maintaining data integrity. The filtering process should not lead to biased or unfair outcomes and must respect the dignity and autonomy of all users. Ensure the system is accountable and responsible for accurate data representation, promoting trustworthiness and sustainable practices.

text: The system shall allow a user to define the time segments
ethical_us:
**Title**: User-Controlled Scheduling for Enhanced Autonomy

**Description**: As an ethically-designed system, it shall allow users to define the time segments of their interaction to ensure their freedom and autonomy are respected. By giving users control over their scheduling, the system supports users' individual preferences and promotes a sense of empowerment and trust in the technology.

text: The system shall display the local and exercise time in separate clocks
ethical_us:
**Title**: Clear and Accessible Time Display for Users' Well-being

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to display local time and exercise time on separate clocks to ensure clarity and prevent confusion, thereby promoting user well-being and fairness in time management. This respects users' autonomy by allowing them to clearly differentiate between local time and the time allocated for exercise activities.

text: The system shall offer the ability to pause and resume the refresh of data.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Pause and Resume Data Refresh for User Control

**Description**: As a user, I want to have the ability to pause and resume the refresh of data, so that I can maintain my autonomy and control over the information flow, ensuring my interaction with the system is respectful of my preferences and circumstances.

text: The system shall provide charts for the Activity or Event actual versus assumed time.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparency in Activity Duration Charts

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to provide clear and understandable charts comparing the actual versus assumed times for activities or events, so that I can easily understand any discrepancies, fostering transparency in time tracking.

text: The system shall provide a history report of changes made to the Activity or Event data
ethical_us:
**Title**: Traceability and Transparency in Activity or Event Data

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to provide a history report of changes made to the Activity or Event data, so that I can understand and verify the modifications that have been made, ensuring transparency and accountability in data management.

text: The look and feel of the system shall conform to the user interface standards of the smart device.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure User Interface Accessibility and Consistency

**Description**: As a user, I want the look and feel of the system to conform to the user interface standards of the smart device so that I can have a consistent and accessible experience, ensuring usability and maintaining my dignity through respectful design.

text: The user interface shall have standard menus buttons for navigation
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Intuitive and Accessible Navigation

**Description**: As a user, I want the user interface to have standard menus and buttons for navigation, so I can easily understand and use the system without confusion. This ensures fairness and dignity by making the system accessible to all users, including those with limited technical skills, and upholds trust by providing a predictable and reliable user experience.

text: The system shall have a professional appearance
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Professional and Trustworthy Appearance

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to have a professional appearance so that I can trust the information and services it provides, ensuring that the interface conveys reliability, competence, and integrity, thereby fostering user trust and confidence.

text: The product shall have a consistent color scheme and fonts.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Promote Visual Accessibility and Inclusivity 

**Description**: As a designer, I want the product to have a consistent color scheme and fonts, so that users with visual impairments or cognitive disabilities can navigate and understand the interface easily and without confusion, promoting dignity, fairness, and trust.

text: The system shall be used by realtors with no training.
ethical_us:

**Description**: As a real estate company, we want our system to be intuitive and require no specialized training for realtors, ensuring that it is accessible and understandable to all users regardless of their technical background, thereby promoting autonomy and fairness.

text: The product shall be easy for a realtor to learn.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Make AI Product Learnable for Realtors  
**Description**: Ensure that the AI product is designed with intuitive interfaces and comprehensive training resources that allow realtors to easily understand and use the system. This promotes autonomy by empowering realtors to effectively interact with the technology, and supports trust by demonstrating a commitment to creating user-friendly and accessible tools.

text: The product shall produce search results in an acceptable time
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Timely Search Results Delivery

**Description**: As a user, I want the search results to be generated within an acceptable time frame so that my trust in the system is maintained and my autonomy in receiving quick and reliable information is respected.

text: The search results shall be returned no later 30 seconds  after the user has entered the search criteria
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Timely and Understandable Search Results 

**Description**: As a user, I want search results to be returned within 30 seconds of entering the search criteria, ensuring transparency in the system's responsiveness and trust in its efficacy. 

**Ethical Principles Involved**: Transparency, Trust

text: The product shall generate a CMA report in an acceptable time.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Timely and Reliable CMA Report Generation

This supports the principles of trust, justice and fairness, and transparency.

text: The CMA report shall be returned no later 60 seconds after the user has entered the CMA report criteria.
ethical_us:

**Description**: Ensure that the CMA report is returned within 60 seconds of the user entering the criteria to uphold the principles of trust and responsibility. This timely response fosters user confidence and demonstrates the system's reliability in processing and delivering accurate information promptly.

text: The product shall synchronize contacts and appointments in an acceptable time.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Synchronization of Contacts and Appointments 

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to synchronize contacts and appointments within an acceptable time frame so that it respects my autonomy and does not disrupt my schedule. The synchronization process should ensure data privacy by securing personal data and maintaining transparency about how the data is handled. Additionally, it must be designed with beneficence in mind, making sure it enhances my productivity and well-being without causing any harm or delays. The system should also be fair, providing equal performance and efficiency to all users, and be reliable, building trust by consistently delivering accurate and timely updates.

text: The product shall synchronize with the office system every hour.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent and Responsible Data Synchronization 

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to synchronize with the office system every hour in a transparent way, ensuring that I am informed about what data is being synced, and that the process is performed with responsibility and integrity, ensuring no harm to my data privacy and maintaining system security.

text: The product shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days  per year
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Continuous Accessibility of the Product

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to be accessible 24 hours a day, 365 days a year, so that I can rely on it for consistent and uninterrupted service, thereby fostering trust and benefiting from its continuous availability.

text: Out of 1000 accesses to the system the system is available 999 times.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure High Availability and Reliability of the System

**Description**: As an AI development team, we ensure that out of 1000 accesses to the system, it is available 999 times to maintain users' trust and uphold the principle of responsibility. text: The product shall operate in offline mode whenever internet connection is unavailable.
ethical_us:

text: The product shall allow the user to view previously downloaded search results CMA reports  and appointments.
ethical_us:

**Description**: As a user, I want to be able to view previously downloaded search results, CMA reports, and appointments in a manner that ensures my privacy and respects my rights to data ownership, so that I can trust the system to manage my data responsibly and without compromising my personal information.

text: The product shall retain user preferences in the event of a failure.
ethical_us:

**Description**: As a responsible AI development team, we will design and implement mechanisms to ensure that user preferences are retained even in the event of a system failure. This safeguards users’ privacy, autonomy, and dignity by preventing data loss and avoids negative impacts on user trust and experience.

text: 100% of saved user preferences shall be restored when system comes back online.
ethical_us:

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to fully restore my saved preferences when it comes back online, ensuring my freedom and autonomy to tailor my interactions with the platform while maintaining trust in the system’s reliability and integrity.

text: The product shall be able to support multiple remote users
ethical_us:
**Title**: Support for Multiple Remote Users with Privacy and Fairness

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to facilitate the simultaneous use by multiple remote individuals, ensuring their privacy is protected and access is equitable, so that everyone can use the system securely without experiencing discrimination or data breaches.

text: The product shall be able support 1000 simultaneous users.

**Description**: As a developer, I want the product to support 1000 simultaneous users to ensure widespread accessibility and reliability, while maintaining high standards of transparency, privacy, and security for all users. This will honor users' trust, uphold their dignity, and ensure that the system operates fairly and responsibly without compromising individual freedoms or causing harm.

text: The product shall be capable of handling the existing 1000 users. This number is expected to grow 5 times within the next year.
ethical_us:

**Description**: The product shall be designed and implemented in a scalable manner that handles the current 1000 users efficiently and ensures seamless support for an anticipated growth to 5000 users within the next year. This growth must be managed in a way that maintains user trust and system reliability, ensuring fairness in access and preserving the privacy and dignity of all users, while promoting sustainability and ensuring no harm is done during the scaling process.

text: The product shall be installed by an untrained realtor without recourse to separately-printed instructions.
ethical_us:

This aligns with the ethical principle of transparency and freedom and autonomy, ensuring that the product is understandable and accessible, thereby empowering users to install it with confidence and without external dependencies.

text: 90% of untrained realtors shall be able to install the product on their device without printed instructions
ethical_us:

**Description**: As a developer, I want 90% of untrained realtors to be able to install the product on their device without printed instructions to promote accessibility, autonomy, and trust while ensuring the product's ease of use and reducing the environmental impact associated with printed materials.

text: The product is expected to run on Windows CE and Palm operating systems.

The system should also protect the privacy of personal information contained within the MLS database, and ensure that the functionality aligns with the principles of responsibility and trustworthiness.

text: The user shall be able to get driving directions to a selected property

text: The user shall be able to download appointments and contact information for clients

text: The system shall display clear property images in the search results

text: The system shall update or create new property listings in the MLS

text: Realtor shall be able to generate a CMA report based on property criteria

text: The system shall be able to call the seller or buyer to schedule an appointment

text: The realtor shall be notified of new client appointments after automatic synchronization with office system

text: The realtor shall be able to retrieve a map showing property locations for a specified area

text: The system shall notify the realtor when a seller or buyer responds to an appointment request

**Description**: As a realtor, I want to receive timely and clear notifications when a seller or buyer responds to an appointment request, so that I can manage appointments effectively, ensure transparency in communication, and build trust with all parties involved.

text: The product shall allow the user to save the property search results.

text: The system shall be easy to use by the Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members.
ethical_us:

text: All of the users shall be able to use the system after one day of training.

text: The system shall help the user avoid making mistakes while scheduling classes and clinicals for the nursing students.
ethical_us:

**Description**: As a system, I will provide guidance and checks to help users avoid mistakes while scheduling classes and clinicals for nursing students. This will promote non-maleficence by preventing scheduling conflicts that could harm students' educational progress and personal well-being, ensure justice and fairness by treating all students equally, and build trust by maintaining a reliable and effective scheduling system.

text: The number of mistakes noted by the students shall be decreased by 50% in the first year.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Accuracy and Minimize Errors in Educational Tools

**Description**: As an educational software developer, I want to design and implement features that reduce the number of mistakes noted by students by 50% within the first year, ensuring the content is accurate and reliable, to uphold the principles of non-maleficence and trust by promoting a high-quality learning experience that avoids misinformation and builds student confidence in the tool.

text: 2 out of 3 Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall successfully be able to use the system to manage the scheduling of classes and clinicals.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Usability for Program Administrators and Nursing Staff

**Description**: As a system designer, I want to ensure that 2 out of 3 Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members can easily and successfully use the system to manage class and clinical schedules, thereby promoting responsibility, trust, and dignity in their professional roles, and ensuring justice and fairness in access to and usability of the tools provided.

text: The system shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Understandable Communication

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community to ensure that information is easily comprehensible, enhancing transparency and fostering trust.

text: The verbiage used within the system shall be consistent with Standard English and the terminology of the national Nursing Community.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Clear and Consistent Communication Within the Nursing Community

**Description**: As a system developer, I want to ensure that the verbiage used within the system is consistent with Standard English and adheres to the terminology used by the national Nursing Community, so that communication is clear, professional, and easily understood by all healthcare professionals, maintaining trust and dignity.

text: Staff members shall be able to complete a set of tasks in a timely manner.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Responsible Task Management for Staff

**Description**: As a developer or stakeholder, ensure that staff members can complete a set of tasks in a timely manner. This includes implementing transparent processes and providing clear communication and explanations about task management systems. Guarantee that the system is designed with non-maleficence, ensuring it does not harm staff members by overburdening them. Uphold responsibility for maintaining system accountability and integrity, while also respecting the privacy and dignity of staff. Strive for sustainability in workload distribution, ensuring it contributes to overall workplace wellbeing. Lastly, ensure that the system functions in a way that promotes justice and fairness, does not discriminate, fosters trust among staff members, and supports their freedom and autonomy in task completion.

text: The response time of general student management tasks shall take no longer than 5 seconds and the response time of schedule generation shall take no longer than 30 seconds.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Efficient and Transparent System Responses for Student Management

**Description**: As a user of the student management system, I want the system to ensure that general management tasks respond within 5 seconds and schedule generation within 30 seconds, promoting both transparency and trust by providing reliable and timely feedback. No user should experience extended delays, ensuring fairness and maintaining the dignity of all users by respecting their time and needs.

text: The system shall be available for use between the hours of 8am and 6pm.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Availability for Inclusive Access

**Description**: Ensure the system is accessible during reasonable and inclusive hours (8am to 6pm) to respect users' autonomy, dignity, and promote fairness by accommodating a diverse range of working schedules and personal commitments.

text: The system shall achieve 95% up time.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure System Reliability

**Description**: To build and maintain trust, the system shall ensure a minimum of 95% uptime, demonstrating reliability and commitment to providing a consistent and dependable service to the users.

text: system shall be able to handle all of the user requests/usage during business hours.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure System Reliability and Availability During Business Hours 
**Description**: As a responsible organization, we want the system to handle all user requests and usage efficiently during business hours to maintain trust, ensure fairness, and prevent disruptions that could adversely impact user's autonomy and productivity. We aim to design the system to be robust and reliable, minimizing the risk of downtime and ensuring that it can scale according to demand without compromising performance or user experience.

text: The system shall cater to 10 simultaneous users from 9am to 5pm.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure System Equitability for User Access

**Description**: As a developer, I want the system to ensure fair and just access for 10 simultaneous users from 9 am to 5 pm, so that all users have equal opportunity to benefit from the system without experiencing discrimination or unfair treatment due to limited availability of resources.

text: The system shall be capable of processing 100% of nursing students and their classes for the next 10 years.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Fair and Transparent Processing of Nursing Students Data

**Description**: As a responsible AI development team, we need to develop a system that processes 100% of nursing students and their classes for the next 10 years while ensuring transparency in its operations. We will ensure that the data processing practices are fair, non-discriminatory, and respect the privacy and dignity of the students. This system will also maintain high standards of accountability, consistently benefiting the students and the educational institution, and fostering trust through reliable performance and ethical data handling practices.

text: The system shall be expected to manage the nursing program curriculum and class/clinical scheduling for a minimum of 5 years.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Management of Nursing Program Curriculum and Scheduling

**Description**: Ensure the system responsibly manages the nursing program curriculum and class/clinical scheduling for a minimum of 5 years, prioritizing accuracy, transparency, and fairness. This includes providing explainable and understandable scheduling processes to avoid mismanagement, ensuring schedules do no harm to the workload and wellbeing of nurses, maintaining the privacy of personal data, and fostering trust among stakeholders by demonstrating accountability and integrity in managing the system.

text: The system shall able to operate within a business office environment typical of the Nursing Department at DePaul University.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Ethical Operation within Business Office Environment

**Description**: As a responsible developer, I want the system to operate ethically within a business office environment typical of the Nursing Department at DePaul University, ensuring that it adheres to principles of non-maleficence by avoiding harm, maintains privacy of sensitive personal data, fosters a trustworthy environment, upholds justice and fairness in its operations, and respects the dignity and autonomy of its users.
