text: The product\92s Look and Feel shall be able to incorporate aspects of the customer\92s organization such as logo  branding  and identity
ethical_us:
**Title**: Incorporate Customer's Branding and Identity 

**Description**: As a developer, I want the product's look and feel to integrate seamlessly with the customer's organizational branding, including logo, colors, and identity, ensuring it respects and promotes the customer's identity and autonomy while fostering trust and transparency.

text: The product shall have a conservative and professional appearance.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure a Conservative and Professional Appearance  

**Description**: The product shall be designed with a conservative and professional aesthetic to uphold the principles of dignity and trust. This ensures that the appearance of the product communicates respectability and reliability, thereby fostering user confidence and maintaining the inherent worth of all individuals interacting with it.

text: The product shall make the users want to use it. 80% of the users surveyed report they are regularly using the product after the first 2 weeks post-launch.
ethical_us:
**Title**: User Engagement and Satisfaction

**Description**: Ensure that the product is designed to be engaging, user-friendly, and beneficial, such that it promotes voluntary and frequent usage without resorting to manipulative tactics. Aim for 80% of users to report regular use of the product within the first two weeks post-launch, while respecting their freedom and autonomy, and ensuring their interaction is positive and ethical.

text: The product shall be easy to use. 90% of users will be able to successfully reserve a conference room within 5 minutes of product use.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Usability and User Empowerment 

**Description**: As a user, I should be able to easily reserve a conference room within 5 minutes of using the product, enabling a seamless experience that respects my time and autonomy, fostering trust and ensuring accessibility for all users.

text: The product shall give users feedback when necessary. 80% of the users surveyed report that the product accurately confirms their actions.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Provide Timely and Accurate User Feedback

**Description**: As an AI system, I must provide users with timely and accurate feedback on their actions to ensure transparency and build trust. This feedback mechanism should be designed to confirm user actions accurately, as evidenced by at least 80% of users surveyed reporting satisfaction with the confirmation provided. This promotes user confidence and enhances the understandability and reliability of the system.

text: The product shall allow the user to select a chosen language from one of the target market countries.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Multilingual Accessibility and Inclusion

**Description**: The product shall empower users by allowing them to select their preferred language from one of the target market countries. This supports autonomy and dignity by respecting users' linguistic preferences and enhances justice and fairness by ensuring equitable access to the product's functionalities.

text: The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Customization of Start Page and Views Preferences

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to allow me to customize my start page and view preferences to enhance my autonomy and trust in the system while ensuring that these preferences are respected and privacy is maintained.

text: An employee will be able to successfully use the product within a few minutes.  After informally navigating the product for less than 15 minutes  users shall be able to successfully setup meetings and reserve conference rooms.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Intuitive Usability for Efficient Onboarding

**Description**: As an employee, I want to be able to successfully use the product within a few minutes by navigating it informally for less than 15 minutes, so that I can easily set up meetings and reserve conference rooms without extensive training. This promotes fairness by providing an accessible user experience for all employees regardless of their technical skills, upholds dignity by respecting users' time and abilities, and builds trust by ensuring that the system is reliable and user-friendly from the outset.

text: The product shall use a standard navigation menu familiar to most web users.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure User Familiarity with Standard Navigation Menu

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to use a standard navigation menu that is familiar to most web users, so that I can easily navigate and use the website without confusion or frustration, thus respecting my autonomy and ensuring a user-friendly experience. This also helps build trust by providing a familiar and reliable interface, and adheres to principles of beneficence by aiming to benefit users through ease of use.

text: The product shall allow for intuitive searching of available conference rooms.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Intuitive and Inclusive Search for Conference Rooms

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to provide an intuitive and easy-to-use search functionality for available conference rooms, ensuring fairness, accessibility, and transparency. This includes clear communication and explanation of search results and criteria, so that all employees, regardless of technical proficiency or ability, can efficiently find and book conference rooms without any form of bias or discrimination. Additionally, the system should respect user privacy by safeguarding any personal data involved in the search process.

text: The response shall be fast enough to avoid interrupting the user\92s flow of thought.  90% of tasks shall complete within 5 seconds.  98% of tasks shall complete within 8 seconds.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Non-disruptive User Interaction through Timely Responses

**Description**: As a developer, I want the system's response time to be within 5 seconds for 90% of tasks and within 8 seconds for 98% of tasks, so that users' flow of thought is not interrupted, thereby respecting their dignity and maintaining their trust in the system's efficiency and reliability.

text: Aside from server failure  the software product shall achieve 99.99% up time.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Reliable Service Availability

**Description**: As a user, I want the software product to maintain a 99.99% uptime, aside from server failures, so I can trust that the service will be consistently available without interruptions, ensuring a reliable and dependable user experience.

text: The product shall create an exception log of problems encountered within the product for transmission to our company for analysis and resolution.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Exception Logging for Transparent Problem Resolution

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to transparently create an exception log of problems it encounters, ensuring it does so in a way that protects my privacy and allows for responsible analysis and resolution by the company. This will help the company address and resolve issues effectively without compromising my data security and trust.

text: The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests.  This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2.  The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Fair System Performance During Peak Times

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to manage up to 1,000 concurrent requests, scaling to 2,000 in future releases, so that it performs reliably and fairly for all users, even during peak scheduling times like early morning and late afternoon hours, ensuring that all users have equitable access and a seamless experience regardless of the time of day.

text: The product shall be able to process 10 000 transactions per hour within two years of its launch.  This number will increase to 20 000 by Release 2.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Scalability with Ethical Assurance

**Description**: As a product manager, I want the product to process 10,000 transactions per hour within two years of its launch, increasing to 20,000 by Release 2, while ensuring that the increase in capacity adheres to the principles of responsibility, non-maleficence and sustainability. This includes thorough testing to ensure that no harm comes to users during peak transactions, maintaining system integrity, and minimizing the environmental impact of scaling up our infrastructure.

text: The product shall be expected to operate for at least 5 years for each customer installation.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Long-Term Operational Reliability

**Description**: As a product developer, I want the product to operate reliably for at least 5 years for each customer installation to respect the principles of trust and responsibility, ensuring that the systems are secure and effective over a long period and building confidence in our commitment to quality and integrity.

text: The product shall be used in office environments.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Use of AI in Office Environments 

**Description**: As a stakeholder, I want the use of AI products in office environments to adhere to ethical principles such as transparency, non-maleficence, responsibility, privacy, beneficence, freedom and autonomy, sustainability, dignity, justice and fairness, and trust, ensuring the AI technology is implemented in a manner that promotes a safe, fair, and respectful workplace.

text: The product must be able to interface with any HTML browser.  The product shall transmit data between the user and the product without problems. The product shall display HTML properly in 80% of all HTML browsers tested (minimum is to test 8 browsers).
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Cross-Browser Compatibility and Data Integrity

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to interface seamlessly with any HTML browser that I may use to ensure accessibility and inclusivity (justice and fairness). The product should transmit data securely and reliably to avoid any loss or corruption of my information (trust and responsibility). Furthermore, the product should display HTML content correctly in a significant majority of tested browsers to ensure a consistent and high-quality user experience across different platforms (beneficence and non-maleficence).

text: The product must be able to interface with various database management systems. The product shall communicate successfully with the database management system on 100% of all transactions.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Reliable and Trustworthy Database Integration

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to interface seamlessly with various database management systems and ensure 100% successful communication on all transactions, so that I can trust the system to handle my data effectively and securely without any loss or corruption.

text: The product must be able to interface with various email servers. The product shall be able to send email.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Secure and Private Email Communication

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to interface with various email servers and send emails, ensuring the security and privacy of my personal data, to maintain trust and protect my information from unauthorized access.

text: The product shall be available for distribution via the Internet as a binary or ZIP file.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Fair and Equitable Distribution of the Product

**Description**: As a software development team, we will ensure that the product is distributed via the Internet as a binary or ZIP file, making it accessible to a wide range of users while ensuring fairness and equity in access. This distribution method will also consider user privacy and security by providing verified and safe download options.

text: The product shall be available for distribution as a packaged CD.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Sustainable Physical Distribution 
**Description**: As a responsible developer, I want the distribution of our product via packaged CDs to align with sustainable practices to minimize environmental impact and promote eco-friendly packaging solutions.

text: The product will be available for licensing as a one-server  two-five servers  or five-or-more servers license.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Fair and Transparent Licensing Options

**Description**: As a user, I want the product's licensing options (one-server, two-to-five servers, or five-or-more servers) to be clearly explained and fairly priced, ensuring transparency and justice in the licensing process.

text: A new user must be able to be added to the system within 10 minutes. 90% of new users are able to log into the system within 10 minutes.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Timely and Fair User Onboarding

**Description**: As a system developer, I need to ensure that new users can be added to the system within 10 minutes and that 90% of users are able to log in within this timeframe. This guarantees that all users, regardless of their background or technical proficiency, can quickly and fairly access the system. The transparency of the process should be clear, the privacy of user data respected, and no user should be subject to undue frustrations or exclusions, thus fostering trust and autonomy.

text: The product must be designed using Design Patterns and coding best practices.  90% of maintenance software developers are able to integrate new functionality into the product with 2 working days.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Maintainable and Structured Design

**Description**: As a software developer, I want the product to be designed using Design Patterns and coding best practices so that 90% of maintenance software developers are able to integrate new functionality into the product within 2 working days. This will promote sustainability, enhance trust in the system's reliability, support the freedom and autonomy of developers, and ensure responsible development practices.

text: The product must be highly configurable for use with various database management systems for the end users.  80% of end users are able to integrate new database management systems with the product without changing the product\92s software code.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Configurability and Flexibility in Database Integration

**Description**: As an end user, I want the product to be highly configurable for integration with various database management systems, ensuring that 80% of users can achieve seamless integration without needing to modify the software code, thereby respecting user autonomy, maintaining trust, and promoting justice and fairness by providing equal access to all.

text: Maintenance releases will be offered to customers once a year.  The releases shall take no longer than 5 minutes for 80% of the customer base to install.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Timely and Efficient Maintenance Releases 

**Description**: Ensure maintenance releases are offered annually and designed to be completed within 5 minutes for 80% of customers, prioritising non-disruptiveness. This approach safeguards user autonomy and minimizes downtime, thereby respecting users' time and contributing to their trust in our system.

text: Every registered user will have access to the product\92s support site via the Internet.  70% of registered users shall find a solution to their problem within 5 minutes of using the support site.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Accessible and Efficient User Support for Registered Users

**Description**: Ensure that every registered user has accessible and efficient access to the product's support site via the Internet. Prioritize user experience by designing the support system so that at least 70% of registered users can find a solution to their problem within 5 minutes. This aligns with principles of beneficence, justice and fairness, and trust by providing timely assistance, promoting equal access, and building user confidence in the support system.

text: The customer shall be able to easily integrate new building maps with the product throughout the product\92s lifecycle.  Integration of new maps with the product shall be possible with little to no support from product support staff.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Empowering Customers with Seamless Map Integration

**Description**: As a customer, I want to easily integrate new building maps with the product throughout its lifecycle without needing significant support from product staff, to ensure my autonomy and foster trust in the system's reliability and user-friendliness.

text: The product shall be translated into foreign languages other than the target market countries\92 languages in future releases.  For each emerging target market  it shall take no more than 5 days to configure the product for that market\92s language.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Multilingual Configuration for Emerging Markets

**Description**: As a development team, we shall ensure that the product is translated into foreign languages relevant to emerging target markets within a maximum of 5 days. This will promote inclusivity, respect cultural diversity (Dignity), and ensure that users from various regions can access and benefit from the product (Beneficence). Additionally, we will maintain transparency in the translation process, ensuring the accuracy and appropriateness of language used (Transparency and Trust).

text: The product is expected to integrate with multiple database management systems. The product will operate with Oracle  SQL Server  DB2  MySQL  HSQL  and MS Access.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Compatibility Across Multiple Database Management Systems

**Description**: As a developer, I want the product to integrate seamlessly with various database management systems (Oracle, SQL Server, DB2, MySQL, HSQL, and MS Access) to promote fairness and autonomy. This will allow users the freedom to choose their preferred database system, ensuring fair access and capabilities across different platforms, ultimately benefitting a diverse user base while maintaining respect for individual choices and requirements.

text: The product shall be able to be installed in any operating environment within 2 days.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Installation Efficiency

**Description**: Ensure that the product can be installed in any operating environment within 2 days while maintaining transparency regarding system requirements and setup processes. The installation process should do no harm to existing systems (non-maleficence) and respect user privacy. Additionally, aim for responsible deployment, beneficence by minimizing downtime, and uphold user trust through reliable and secure installation procedures.

text: The product shall ensure that only company employees or external users with company-approved user IDs may have product access.  100% of all logons shall be by either company employees or external users with company-approved user IDs.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure Access Control for Product Usage

**Description**: As a company, we need to ensure that only authorized personnel—either company employees or external users with company-approved user IDs—have access to the product. This will enhance the principles of Privacy and Trust by protecting sensitive data and ensuring that the product is only used by vetted individuals. 100% of all logons must be verified against company-issued credentials to maintain robust security and accountability.

text: Only managers are able to perform search queries for reservations by user.  100% of all search queries for reservations by user shall be from logons of only management logons.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Restricted Access to Reservation Search Queries

**Description**: As a stakeholder, I want only managers to have access to perform search queries for reservations by user, ensuring that 100% of these search queries originate from management logons. This measure ensures privacy of personal data, accountability, and non-maleficence by restricting access to sensitive information to designated and responsible personnel only.

text: The product shall ensure that the database\92s data corresponds to the data entered by the user.  Each conference room reservation in the system will contain the same information as was entered by the user.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Data Integrity and Correspondence

**Description**: As a user, I want the product's database to accurately reflect the data I have entered to ensure transparency and trust. Each conference room reservation in the system should retain the same information as submitted, safeguarding my autonomy and maintaining the integrity and privacy of my data.

text: The product shall prevent the input of malicious data.  The product and/or adjacent hardware/software systems\92 data shall remain 100% uncorrupted each time malicious data is input into the product.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Protection Against Malicious Data Inputs

**Description**: As a responsible developer, I want the product to prevent the input of malicious data to ensure that both the product and any adjacent hardware/software systems' data remain 100% uncorrupted. This aligns with the principles of non-maleficence and trust by ensuring that the product does no harm and retains the users' trust in the system's stability and integrity.

text: The product and/or dependent databases/filesystems shall remain operational as a result of the input of malicious data.  The product and/or dependent databases/filesystems shall not crash 100% of the time that malicious data is input into the product.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure System Integrity Against Malicious Data

**Description**: As a developer, I want the product and its dependent databases/filesystems to remain operational even when malicious data is input, so that the system maintains its non-maleficence by avoiding harm through crashes, ensures trust by demonstrating reliability, and upholds responsibility by being accountable for system robustness.

text: The language of the product shall accommodate all of the target market countries. 90% of survey respondents from each target market country will find that the language of the product is acceptable.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Multilingual Inclusion in Product Language

**Description**: As a product developer, I want to ensure that the product's language accommodates all target market countries so that 90% of survey respondents from each country find the language acceptable. This promotes justice and fairness by preventing linguistic barriers and ensuring equitable access for all users, respecting their dignity, and fostering trust in the product.

text: The product shall be able to display calendar dates and times according to the user\92s locale.  90% of survey respondents from each target market country will find that the date and time formatting of the product is correct.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Locale-Aware Date and Time Display

**Description**: As a user, I need the product to display calendar dates and times according to my locale, ensuring that it is culturally appropriate and easily understandable. This feature should be designed to achieve a 90% satisfaction rate in terms of date and time formatting accuracy based on survey responses from each target market, aligning with principles of justice and fairness to avoid any bias and enhance user trust by delivering reliable and culturally sensitive experiences.

text: The product must be developed with the J2SE/J2EE programming language libraries
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Sustainable Development in Technology Choices  
**Description**: As a developer, I want to use J2SE/J2EE programming language libraries to ensure that our technology choices are sustainable and align with industry standards, reducing potential environmental impacts and promoting long-term viability of the software.

text: The product shall record meeting entries.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Recording of Meeting Entries

**Description**: Ensure that the meeting entry recording feature is implemented with transparent processes, respects the privacy of participants by securely handling personal data, and prevents any misuse of the recorded information. Ensure that the feature provides clear communication about its functionality and purpose, upholds participants' dignity by obtaining consent prior to recording, and implements measures to prevent any harm that could arise from misuse of the recorded data.

text: The product will notify employees of meeting invitations.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Notification of Meeting Invitations

**Description**: As a responsible AI system, the product will notify employees of meeting invitations in a transparent, non-intrusive, and timely manner while ensuring the privacy and dignity of the employees. The notifications should aim to enhance beneficence by supporting employees in managing their schedules effectively, and the system must uphold justice and fairness by providing consistent notifications to all employees without bias or discrimination.

text: The product shall have the ability to send meeting reminders to employees.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Meeting Reminder Notifications

**Description**: As a product manager, I want the product to send meeting reminders to employees in a manner that respects their privacy, ensures transparency regarding data usage, and does not cause unnecessary stress or disruption to their work-life balance, thereby upholding their dignity and autonomy.

text: The product shall assign the organizers contact information to each meeting they create.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Preserving Organizer Privacy in Meeting Information

**Description**: As a developer, I want to ensure that the product assigns the organizer's contact information to each meeting they create so that it is accessible only to the intended participants, thereby protecting the privacy and maintaining the dignity of the organizer.

text: The product will record meeting acknowledgements.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent and Responsible Recording of Meeting Acknowledgements

**Description**: As a team member, I want the product to transparently record meeting acknowledgements, ensuring that all participants are aware of and consent to the recording process. This will foster accountability, maintain trust, and uphold ethical standards of transparency and responsibility in our operations.

text: The product shall store new conference rooms.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparency and Privacy in Storing New Conference Rooms

**Description**: As a user, I want the process of storing new conference rooms to be transparent, ensuring that all stakeholders understand how data is managed, and that privacy measures are in place to protect any sensitive information associated with these rooms.

text: The product shall update existing conference rooms.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent and Inclusive Updating of Conference Rooms

**Description**: As a user, I want the process of updating existing conference rooms to be transparent and inclusive. The updated facilities should be designed based on clear, communicated criteria that ensure they respect privacy, promote accessibility and user autonomy, and avoid any form of discrimination or unfair treatment. This would assure all users that their needs are equitably considered and that the updates will benefit the community sustainably and ethically.

text: The product will be able to delete conference rooms.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Deletion of Conference Rooms

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to allow the deletion of conference rooms in a manner that respects privacy, ensures transparency, and maintains data integrity, so that the action is conducted responsibly and ethically.

text: The product shall be able to store new room equipment.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Privacy and Compliance in Storing Room Equipment Data

**Description**: As a developer, I want to ensure that the product's functionality to store new room equipment is designed to protect users' privacy, comply with data protection regulations, and implement strong data security measures. This ensures that data is handled responsibly, and user trust is maintained.

text: The product will update existing room equipment.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Transparency and Trust in Room Equipment Updates

**Description**: As a user, I need clear and understandable information about updates to existing room equipment, including the purpose and impact of these updates, so that I can trust the process and understand how it benefits me without compromising my autonomy or privacy.

text: The product shall be able to delete room equipment.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Deletion of Room Equipment

**Description**: As a responsible system, the product shall transparently and securely enable the deletion of room equipment, ensuring that no unintended harm occurs, protecting user privacy, and maintaining trust by providing clear explanations and confirmations before any data related to deleted equipment is permanently removed.

text: The product shall allow an organizer to invite other employees to meetings.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Ethical Invitations to Meetings

**Description**: As an organizer, I want to invite other employees to meetings in a manner that upholds their privacy, autonomy, and dignity, ensuring they are informed transparently about the meeting's purpose, their data is protected, and they have the freedom to accept or decline the invitation without any undue pressure.

text: Each time a conference room is reserved  the conference room schedule shall be updated to reflect the time and date of the reservation.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Accurate and Transparent Conference Room Scheduling

**Description**: As a conference room management user or administrator, I want the conference room schedule to be transparently and accurately updated each time a reservation is made, ensuring that all users have a reliable and clear view of room availability. This transparency helps prevent overbooking, maintains trust among users, and supports fair and equitable access to shared resources.

text: The product shall record the transportation status of equipment reserved.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent and Responsible Tracking of Reserved Equipment

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to record the transportation status of reserved equipment in a transparent and responsible manner, ensuring clarity and accountability throughout the process. This will help build trust and prevent any misuse or miscommunication regarding the transportation of the equipment.

text: The product shall display a map of the company building showing conference room locations.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Fair and Accessible Conference Room Mapping

**Description**: As a developer, I want to ensure that the map of the company building showing conference room locations is accessible to all employees, including those with disabilities. Additionally, the information should be up-to-date and accurate to prevent any potential confusion or inconvenience. This will ensure transparency, promote fairness and equity, and enhance user trust in the system.

text: The product shall record updated meeting agendas.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Recording of Updated Meeting Agendas

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to ethically record updated meeting agendas by ensuring that the data recording process is transparent, respects privacy, and is conducted responsibly, so that stakeholders can trust the integrity and security of the information managed.

text: The product shall send a meeting confirmation to the meeting organizer.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Ethical Communication of Meeting Confirmations

**Description**: As a product, I need to send meeting confirmations to the meeting organizers in a transparent and respectful manner, ensuring clear communication, protecting user privacy, and fostering trust in our service. This action should positively contribute to the organizer's ability to coordinate events while maintaining the confidentiality and dignity of all participants involved.

text: The product shall display room equipment according to search parameters.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Display of Room Equipment Based on Search Parameters

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to transparently and fairly display room equipment based on my search parameters without any bias or hidden algorithms, ensuring that the displayed information is accurate, relevant, and respects my privacy and autonomy. This will help foster trust and allow me to make informed decisions that benefit my needs without causing harm.

text: The product shall display conference rooms according to search parameters.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Fair and Transparent Display of Conference Rooms

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to display conference rooms accurately and impartially according to my search parameters, ensuring transparency in search results and fairness in availability. This includes providing clear explanations for why certain rooms are suggested and ensuring that all available rooms are considered without biases.

text: The product shall record different meeting types.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Data Recording for Meeting Types

**Description**: As a developer, I want the product to record different meeting types in a way that maintains transparency about the data being collected, ensures privacy for all participants, and upholds their dignity by securely handling sensitive information. Additionally, I aim to design the recording function to be non-maleficent, ensuring it does not cause harm or misuse of data, and foster trust by clearly communicating what data is being recorded and how it will be used.

text: The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent Records of Reserved Equipment

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to transparently record all equipment reservations to ensure accountability and traceability. This promotes trust and allows stakeholders to verify that the reservation system is fair and reliable.

text: The product shall notify building personnel of equipment transport requests.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent and Responsible Notification of Equipment Transport Requests

**Description**: As a building management system, I want to transparently notify personnel of equipment transport requests in a timely manner, ensuring that all relevant information is clearly communicated and that personnel remain accountable for the handling of these requests. This ensures that actions taken are traceable and responsible, maintaining trust and integrity in the operation of the building.

text: The product will allow priviledged users to view meeting schedules in multiple reporting views.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Ethical Access to Meeting Schedules

**Description**: As a privileged user, I want to view meeting schedules in multiple reporting views transparently so that my access is clearly defined, justified, and limited to necessary information, ensuring the privacy and autonomy of all individuals involved.

text: The product shall be able to send meeting notifications via different kinds of end-user specified methods.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Ethical Meeting Notifications

**Description**: As a responsible developer, I want to provide meeting notification options that prioritize user privacy and autonomy, ensuring that notifications are sent via user-specified methods without compromising their personal data or causing unwanted disruptions.

text: The product shall have a customizable Look and Feel.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Customizable Look and Feel for Inclusive User Experience

**Description**: As a user, I want the ability to customize the look and feel of the product to ensure that it meets my personal preferences, accessibility needs, and cultural sensitivities. This customization promotes user autonomy, respects individual dignity, and ensures fairness and justice by catering to diverse user requirements.

text: The product shall have an intuitive user interface.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring an Intuitive User Interface for All Users

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to have an intuitive and accessible user interface, ensuring that individuals of all abilities can interact with the system easily and effectively. This promotes justice and fairness, supporting trust in the product by ensuring it works properly and respects the dignity of all users by providing an equal user experience.

text: The product will display an available status for unreserved conference rooms.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Transparent Availability of Conference Rooms

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to clearly display the available status of unreserved conference rooms to ensure transparency and facilitate efficient use of resources by providing accurate and timely information.

text: Recreation of Inventory Quantity Adjustment for the period of previous 30 days shall take no more than 30min.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Responsible and Efficient Inventory Adjustment

**Description**: As a system developer, I need to ensure that the recreation of inventory quantity adjustments for the period of the previous 30 days is completed within 30 minutes, to maintain operational efficiency and ensure timely updates. This process should be transparent, maintaining user trust, and must not compromise the integrity or accuracy of the data, adhering to the principles of non-maleficence and justice and fairness.

text: The System shall allow for a minimum of  6 users to work at the same time.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Fair Access for Multiple Users

**Description**: As an ethical requirement, the system shall allow for a minimum of 6 users to work simultaneously to promote fairness and equal access, ensuring that all users can collaborate without being restricted by system limitations. This supports the principles of justice and fairness by providing equitable opportunities for all users to utilize the system concurrently.

text: The System shall utilize currently owned computer equipment.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Usage of Existing Hardware

**Description**: As a responsible AI developer, I want to ensure that our system utilizes currently owned computer equipment to promote sustainability and reduce unnecessary resource consumption. This will help in minimizing environmental impact and supporting sustainable practices.

text: The System shall maintain consistent security.  Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Consistent Security Synchronization

**Description**: Ensure that all changes to user passwords and permissions are promptly synchronized across all parts of the System to maintain consistent security, safeguard user data, and uphold user trust and privacy.

text: The System shall granularly control access rights to all major subsystems.  It should be possible to assign access rights to all subsystems independently.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Granular Control of Access Rights for Enhanced Privacy and Security

**Description**: As an ethical software engineer, I want the system to granularly control access rights to all major subsystems, ensuring that access can be assigned independently, so that users' privacy and security are preserved, and sensitive information is protected from unauthorized access. This ensures compliance with principles of privacy, responsibility, and trust.

text: The System shall not require additional third party licenses resulting in royalty fees.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure No Additional Financial Burden on Users

**Description**: As a responsible developer, I want the system to operate without requiring additional third-party licenses that result in royalty fees, so that users are not subjected to unexpected financial costs, thereby upholding principles of fairness and trust.

text: The System shall allow generation of Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents on demand.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparency and Responsibility in Inventory Quantity Adjustment

**Description**: As a system user, I want the ability to generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents on demand, with transparent and clear communication about the changes and their impacts, to ensure that adjustments are traceable, accountable, and free from any form of misuse or error. This will build trust and promote responsible data handling practices within the organization.

text: The System shall allow on demand generation of all Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents since certain point of time.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical On-Demand Inventory Adjustment Document Generation 

**Description**: As a responsible and transparent organization, we need the system to enable the on-demand generation of all inventory quantity adjustment documents from a specified point in time. This ensures transparency by providing clear and understandable records, supports accountability by making data readily available for audit and review, and enhances trust by demonstrating our commitment to operational integrity and ethical practices.

text: The IQA subsystem shall take into account current inventory status and adjust inventory of substitutionary ingredients accordingly.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Inventory Management for Substitutionary Ingredients

**Description**: As a user of the IQA subsystem, I want the system to transparently and accurately adjust the inventory of substitutionary ingredients based on current inventory status, ensuring the process does not compromise privacy, upholds responsibility and accountability, promotes sustainability by reducing waste, and maintains fairness in resource distribution.

text: The System shall allow entering  storing and modifying product formulas.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure and Transparent Management of Product Formulas

**Description**: As a system user, I need to enter, store, and modify product formulas transparently and securely to ensure that data integrity is maintained, and the processes are understandable and transparent to all stakeholders while respecting privacy and ensuring the system functions effectively and responsibly.

text: Product formulas shall allow use of semi-products  which have own formulas.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent and Responsible Use of Semi-Products in Formulas

**Description**: As a product developer, I want to ensure that the integration of semi-products with their own formulas is transparent, so that all stakeholders can understand the composition and rationale behind each product formulation. This will ensure ethical responsibility and maintain trust with users and regulatory bodies by clearly communicating the use and origin of all semi-products involved.

text: Product formula ingredients shall allow defining substitutionary ingredients.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Fair and Transparent Ingredient Substitution

**Description**: As a product developer, I want the system to allow defining substitutionary ingredients clearly, so that consumers are fully informed and can trust the product's integrity. This ensures transparency and allows users to make informed choices while respecting their autonomy and promoting dignity.

text: Product formula substitutionary ingredients shall be entered automatically by the PFE subsystem.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Automated Ingredient Input for Improved Accuracy and Responsibility

**Description**: As a user of the PFE subsystem, I want the product formula substitutionary ingredients to be entered automatically, so that the process is more accurate and minimizes the risk of human error. This ensures that the product adheres to safety standards (Non-maleficence), respects privacy by reducing manual data handling (Privacy), and upholds responsibility by ensuring that developers and stakeholders can be held accountable for the accuracy of entered data (Responsibility). Additionally, it promotes trust by ensuring the system performs its function reliably and effectively (Trust).

text: Formula substitutionary ingredients shall be kept in persisted order
ethical_us:
**Title**: Preservation of Formula Substitution Order

**Description**: Ensure that the order of substitutionary ingredients in formulas is maintained and persisted to uphold transparency, trust, and justice. This allows users to understand, verify, and trust the integrity of the formulation process, ensuring fair and accurate representation of ingredients.

text: Product shall allow entering  storing and modifying product menus used by POS terminals.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure and Transparent Management of POS Product Menus

**Description**: As a system stakeholder, I want the product to allow entering, storing, and modifying product menus for POS terminals in a secure and transparent manner. This ensures that all changes to the product menus can be tracked and audited, protecting both user privacy and data integrity while maintaining trust in the system.

text: PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Menu Management Integration

**Description**: As a responsible AI system, the PME Subsystem shall integrate with the accounting system to build product menus in a transparent and privacy-respecting manner. This integration will ensure that the data used is accurate, secure, and will not compromise individual privacy, while providing a fair and beneficial experience for all users by accurately reflecting the available products.

text: PME Subsystem shall allow keeping submenus within menus and products within submenus in a managed and persisted order.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Maintain Clear and Transparent Menu and Product Organization

**Description**: As a user, I want the PME Subsystem to allow keeping submenus within menus and products within submenus in a managed and persisted order, so that I can trust the system's transparency and understandability in how information is organized and presented.

text: PME Subsystem shall allow for a product to exist in more than one submenu
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Product Placement Transparency within PME Subsystem  
**Description**: As a user, I want the PME Subsystem to allow a product to exist in more than one submenu to facilitate transparency in product categorization and availability, ensuring that users can easily find and understand the product's functionality and relevance across multiple contexts.

text: The RMS System shall have Windows XP look and feel and use GUI futures making its use intuitive.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Usability and Familiarity in User Interface Design

**Description**: As a user, I want the RMS System to have a Windows XP look and feel with intuitive GUI features, to foster ease of use and a familiar experience. This aligns with the ethical principles of dignity by recognizing and respecting the user’s comfort and usability needs, and trust by ensuring the system is intuitive and reliable for users.

text: The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document based on product daily sales data and product formulas.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Generation of Inventory Quantity Adjustment Document

**Description**: As a responsible system, it shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents based on product daily sales data and product formulas in a manner that ensures transparency in the process, maintains user privacy, promotes trust by securing the data, and ensures fairness and non-maleficence in adjustments, ensuring no harm or unfair advantage to any stakeholders. All adjustments should also consider sustainability by optimizing resource usage efficiently.

text: The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document automatically when daily Product Sales data is available.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Automated Generation of Inventory Quantity Adjustment Document

**Description**: As a user, I need the system to generate an Inventory Quantity Adjustment document automatically when daily Product Sales data is available. This ensures that inventory management is accurate and up-to-date, ultimately upholding principles of transparency and responsibility by reducing human error and providing clear, traceable adjustments to inventory levels.

text: Administrator shall be able to activate a pre-paid card via the Administration section in under 5 seconds.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Ethical Activation Speed for Pre-paid Cards

**Description**: As an administrator, I want to activate a pre-paid card via the Administration section in under 5 seconds, ensuring the process is transparent, secure, and respects user privacy while maintaining system integrity and promoting user trust.

text: Customer shall be able to check the status of their prepaid card  by entering in the PIN number  in under 5 seconds.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure and Efficient Status Check for Prepaid Card

**Description**: As a customer, I want to be able to check the status of my prepaid card by entering my PIN number in under 5 seconds, ensuring a quick, secure, and private process that upholds my autonomy and dignity. This user story aligns with ethical principles by promoting transparency in the process, ensuring non-maleficence with robust security against misuse, maintaining responsibility for accurate status reporting, protecting user privacy, delivering a beneficial service efficiently, and fostering trust by guaranteeing system reliability.

text: System shall let customers register on the website as a \93pay as you go\94 user in under 5 minutes.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Enable Efficient and Transparent User Registration

**Description**: As a customer, I want to register on the website as a "pay as you go" user within 5 minutes, ensuring the process is transparent and my personal data is handled with care. This quick and clear registration process should respect my autonomy by being straightforward and easy to understand, while also guaranteeing privacy and security of my personal information. Through this process, the system should establish trust, showing a commitment to do no harm (non-maleficence) and act responsibly by safeguarding user data.

text: System shall let customers register on the website as a \93unlimited movie subscriber\94 user in under 10 minutes.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Efficiency in User Registration for Unlimited Movie Subscribers

**Description**: As an ethical requirement, the system should allow customers to register as "unlimited movie subscribers" within 10 minutes, ensuring the process is efficient and user-friendly. The registration process must be transparent, clearly explaining each step to the user to build trust and assure users that their privacy and data are protected. The procedure should not introduce any obstacles that could compromise user autonomy or exclude any groups, thereby maintaining justice and fairness. This ensures that the process benefits the user by being quick and non-intrusive, reflecting principles of beneficence, non-maleficence, and dignity.

text: System shall let existing customers log into the website with their email address and password in under 5 seconds.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Enhancing Customer Trust through Efficient Login

**Description**: As an existing customer, I want to log into the website with my email address and password in under 5 seconds to ensure swift and secure access. This fosters trust by demonstrating the system's reliability and efficiency while maintaining data privacy and security.

text: System shall let customers cancel their account  process shall take no longer than 2 minutes.  Database will mark the account as inactive  and user will not be able to log into the website.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure User Freedom and Autonomy in Account Cancellation

**Description**: As a user, I want to be able to cancel my account efficiently, within 2 minutes, and ensure my account is marked as inactive so that I can no longer log into the website. This process respects my freedom and autonomy by providing a swift and straightforward method for opting out of services.

text: System shall let administrator de-activate a customer account in under 1 minute. Customer will no longer be able to access the website.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Just and Fair Deactivation Process

**Description**: As an admin, I want to de-activate a customer account in under 1 minute, while ensuring the process is transparent, just, and respects the dignity and autonomy of the user, so that the user experiences fair treatment and a clear understanding of the reasons behind the deactivation.

text: System shall let administrator add/remove movies on the website in under 5 minutes.  Entered movie information will be stored in the database and will now be available on the website.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring an Efficient and Ethical Movie Management System

**Description**: As an administrator, I want to be able to add or remove movies on the website in under 5 minutes, ensuring a streamlined process for content management. This process must ensure the responsible handling of movie data and maintain transparency in content updates. Furthermore, it should respect user privacy by securely storing entered movie information in the database and making it available on the website without violating individual rights or data protection standards. The system should be just and fair, ensuring no discriminatory practices in the content management process.

text: System shall let the administrator add/remove categories on the website in under 5 minutes.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Administrator Category Management with Accountability and Efficiency

**Description**: As an administrator, I want to be able to add or remove categories on the website in under 5 minutes, ensuring that my actions are transparent and accountable while upholding the dignity and autonomy of users. This process should also be carried out efficiently and responsibly, ensuring no harm is done to the user experience or data integrity.

text: System shall let Izogn Manager access sales and usage statistics in under 2 minutes.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparency and Efficiency in Sales and Usage Statistics Access

**Description**: As an ethical requirement, the system must ensure that the Izogn Manager can access sales and usage statistics efficiently and transparently within 2 minutes. This ensures accountability and allows for clear communication of business metrics, fostering trust and responsibility.

text: System shall let administrators generate unique pre-paid pins in under 2 minutes and generate an Excel file with the generated PINs.
ethical_us:

**Description**: As an administrator, I want the system to generate unique pre-paid PINs in a transparent manner and under 2 minutes, ensuring the process is clear and accountable. The system should also export these PINs into an Excel file to maintain trust and integrity in the data handling process.

text: The website shall be attractive to all audiences.  The website shall appear to be fun and the colors should be bright and vibrant.

**Description**: Design a website that is visually appealing and vibrant to ensure it is attractive to all audiences. The website should use bright and fun colors while prioritizing inclusivity, ensuring that the design is accessible and engaging to people of diverse backgrounds, abilities, and preferences. This aligns with the principles of dignity, justice and fairness, and beneficence by respecting the inherent worth of all users, promoting equality, and aiming to deliver a positive experience for everyone.

text: The website should have an African feel  but should not alienate non-Africans.  The website should use animation on pages which are describing the services  to grab the users attention and encourage them to sign up.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Inclusive and Engaging Web Design

**Description**: Design the website with a distinctly African cultural aesthetic that welcomes and includes non-African users. Implement animation on service description pages to capture user interest without compromising the inclusivity and ease-of-use for all user demographics, ensuring accessibility and a respectful representation of cultural elements to uphold dignity and justice.

text: The website design should be modern  clean  and concise.
ethical_us:
**Title**: User-Friendly and Inclusive Website Design

**Description**: As a user, I want the website design to be modern, clean, and concise to ensure that it is easy to navigate, visually appealing, and accessible to all users, including those with disabilities, thereby upholding the principles of dignity, justice and fairness, and beneficence.

text: The product should be able to be used by 90% of novice users on the Internet.
ethical_us:

**Description**: As a product developer, I want to design the product in a way that ensures 90% of novice users on the Internet can use it effectively, in order to promote inclusivity, justice, and fairness by making the technology accessible to all, regardless of their level of expertise.

text: Users should only have to navigate through a maximum of 4 pages  to create an account with the website.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Minimal Navigation for Account Creation

This ensures transparency, builds trust, and upholds the principle of beneficence by providing a smooth and user-friendly experience.

text: Users should be able to access their streaming movies in under 2 clicks after logging into the website.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent and Efficient Access to Streaming Movies

**Description**: As a user, I want to be able to access my streaming movies within 2 clicks after logging into the website. This will ensure a user-friendly and efficient experience, respect my time, and uphold transparency in the system by providing a clear and straightforward navigation path to my content.

text: An anonymous survey will show that 70% of customers are comfortable purchasing streaming movies after 2 weeks using the website.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparency and Privacy in Customer Surveys

**Description**: As a user, I want the data collected through anonymous surveys to be handled transparently and ensure my privacy is respected, so I can feel comfortable sharing my feedback and experiences honestly after using the website for two weeks.

text: An anonymous survey will show that 95% of customers are comfortable using and purchasing pre-paid cards after a month of using the system.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Customer Comfort and Trust with Pre-Paid Cards

**Description**: As an organization, we want to ensure that at least 95% of customers feel comfortable using and purchasing pre-paid cards after a month of using the system. This will be verified through an anonymous survey to ensure users' freedom and autonomy, trust in the system, and respect for their dignity.

text: The product shall retain the customer\92s buying preferences and information.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Ethical Handling of Customer Buying Preferences and Information

**Description**: As a product designer, I want to ensure that the customer's buying preferences and information are retained responsibly, so that their privacy is protected. This includes obtaining clear consent for data retention, being transparent about how the data will be used, and ensuring that the data is stored securely to maintain customer trust.

text: The product shall be easy for customers with novice skills on the  Internet to purchase and watch streaming movies.  Customers should be able to purchase and watch a pre-determined movie in under 3 minutes.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Accessibility for Novice Internet Users
**Description**: As a customer with novice internet skills, I want to purchase and watch a streaming movie with ease, within 3 minutes, so that I can enjoy my movie experience without feeling frustrated or excluded. This ethical user story underscores the principle of dignity by recognizing the need to respect and accommodate users of varying skill levels, enabling them to interact with the platform freely and autonomously. It also highlights the principle of beneficence, aiming to benefit a broader user base by making the service accessible and user-friendly.

text: The product shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by users familiar with websites
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Understandability in Design

**Description**: The product shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by users familiar with websites, promoting transparency and enabling users to interact with the system effectively and without confusion, thereby respecting user autonomy and ensuring a user-friendly experience.

text: The website will use standard Internet conventions when interacting with the user.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Standard Internet Conventions for User Interaction

**Description**: As a developer, I want the website to use standard Internet conventions when interacting with the user to uphold transparency, trust, and user autonomy, ensuring a familiar and trustworthy user experience.

text: Any interface between a user and the automated system shall have a maximum response time of 5 seconds  unless noted by an exception below.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Timely and Predictable Response for Enhanced User Trust

**Description**: As a user of an automated system, I expect the interface to respond within a maximum of 5 seconds in order to ensure a smooth and efficient interaction experience. This reliability promotes trust in the system and respects the user's time and autonomy by avoiding unnecessary delays, thereby supporting users' expectations of timely and predictable system behavior.

text: When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card  the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Timely and Secure Transactions for Streaming Purchases

**Description**: As a streaming service user, I want my credit card transactions to be processed within 15 seconds to ensure a smooth and efficient user experience while protecting my financial data through secure and transparent methods. This will respect my autonomy, build trust in the service, and uphold privacy standards.

text: When streaming a movie  the buffering time should take no longer than 10 seconds (plus any latency on the user\92s connection.)
ethical_us:
**Title**: Minimize Buffering Time to Enhance User Autonomy and Experience

**Description**: Ensure that buffering time for streaming a movie does not exceed 10 seconds (plus any latency on the user’s connection) to promote user autonomy and provide a seamless and dignified user experience. This aligns with ethical principles of freedom and autonomy, ensuring that users are not unduly hindered by technological limitations, and trust, by assuring reliable and efficient service.

text: While streaming a movie  buffering should only occur if there is latency in the user\92s connection.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Seamless Streaming Experience

**Description**: As a user of the streaming service, I expect that buffering during movie playback should only occur due to latency in my internet connection, and not due to any other issues with the streaming server or system. This is to ensure transparency in the service's performance, promote user autonomy in connection issues, and maintain trust in the platform.

text: All credit card information will be secured on the server  and only accessible by authorized Izogn administrators.  Information will be encrypted in the database.
ethical_us:

**Description**: As an ethical requirement, we will ensure that all credit card information is securely stored on the server and only accessible by authorized Izogn administrators. The information will be encrypted in the database to protect user privacy, maintain trust, and prevent any unauthorized access, adhering to the principles of privacy, responsibility, and trust.

text: The website shall be available for use 24 hours per day  365 days per year.

**Description**: As a responsible developer, I want the website to be available for use 24 hours per day, 365 days per year, to ensure constant access for all users while prioritizing sustainability, reliability, and fairness. This includes implementing robust security measures and maintaining operational integrity to build and uphold user trust, without compromising system performance or disproportionately impacting any user group.

text: The website shall achieve 99.5% up time.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure High Availability and Reliability of the Website

**Title**: Ensure Equitable Access to On-Demand Movie Streaming

This service should be accessible to all users fairly and equitably, respecting their dignity and individual preferences. Additionally, I will implement robust security measures to protect user privacy and build trust in our platform.

text: The website shall continue to operate if the payment gateway goes down.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Continued Service Availability

**Description**: As a user, I want the website to continue operating even if the payment gateway goes down, ensuring that my experience and access to information are not disrupted, preserving my trust in the service and respecting my autonomy to make decisions without unnecessary interruptions.

text: The streaming server will support 50 simultaneous streaming connections.

This also ensures fairness by providing equal service quality to all users, and transparency in the system's capacity.

text: The streaming server will support a maximum of 700 movies
ethical_us:

This supports the ethical principles of sustainability by managing resources effectively, justice and fairness by providing equal access to diverse content for all users, and trust by maintaining reliable and high-quality service.

text: The server will support a maximum of 1 000 simultaneous users.
ethical_us:

text: The website shall be capable of supporting 100 000 customers.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Scalable and Trustworthy Infrastructure for Customer Support

**Description**: As a software developer, I want to build a scalable website infrastructure that can support up to 100,000 customers, ensuring it maintains high reliability and security, so that users can trust our platform to provide consistent and safe service even under heavy load.

text: The product shall be expected to operate within the maximum maintenance budget for a minimum of 2 years.
ethical_us:

text: All aspects of the website shall be accessed by a web browser over the Internet.

text: The same hardware supporting the current website will be used to support the new system.

text: We must be able to interface with the following browsers: IE 5.X  6.0  Netscape 6.x  7.x  8.x and Firefox 1.0.

By accommodating users who may still rely on older browser versions due to various constraints, we support digital equity and uphold the dignity and autonomy of all users. This approach aligns with principles of justice and fairness, ensuring that our technology remains accessible and usable to a diverse user base without excluding those with outdated systems.

text: Website must interface with the CyberSource API to process credit card transactions.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Ethical Credit Card Processing via CyberSource API  
**Description**: As a developer integrating the CyberSource API for processing credit card transactions on the website, it is essential to prioritize transparency by clearly communicating how payment data is processed. Ensure non-maleficence by securing the payment process to prevent fraud and data breaches. Uphold privacy by safeguarding users' personal data during transactions and compliance with relevant data protection laws. Furthermore, promote trust by transparently explaining the security measures in place and providing assurances of data protection.

text: Website must be fully operational with MSN TV2.

text: Movies shall be encoded and streamed via Windows Media Player 9.0.

Furthermore, the system must be just and fair, ensuring equal access and quality of streaming for all users.

text: Movies shall be encoded for 56k and 256k streams.

This guarantees that viewers, irrespective of their technical limitations or socio-economic status, can equally enjoy streaming services without prejudice.

text: Promotional updates to the website should take a day to update.

text: Izogn Administrator must be able to update the category listings on the website within 2 minutes.

text: Izogn Administrator must be able to add new products to the website within 2 minutes.

text: The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.

text: Velkat staff will be available for phone support between 7am-7pm  M-F to provide technical support to the Izogn administrators.

This supports the ethical principles of justice and fairness by guaranteeing equal access to assistance, and trust by maintaining a consistent and dependable service schedule.

text: The product shall be able to be installed in the specified environment within 1 working day.
ethical_us:

**Description**: The product shall be installed in the specified environment within 1 working day, ensuring that the process is fully transparent to the users, with clear and understandable communication throughout. This will help build trust and maintain the autonomy of the users by keeping them well-informed and respecting their time.

text: Only registered customers can purchase streaming movies.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Protecting Registered Customers' Privacy

**Description**: As a streaming service provider, we require only registered customers to purchase streaming movies to ensure the privacy and security of personal data. This measure will also foster trust and prevent unauthorized access, thereby upholding the principles of privacy and trust.

text: A customer can only stream a movie if they purchased it  and are within the 2 day viewing period.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Access Control for Movie Streaming

**Description**: As an ethical streaming platform, we want to ensure that customers can only stream a movie if they have purchased it and are within the 2-day viewing period. This upholds the principle of justice and fairness by ensuring all customers have equal access based on their purchases, maintains transparency about access rights and viewing periods, respects privacy by securely managing viewing rights, and builds trust by honoring and enforcing purchase agreements.

text: Only authorized personnel can access customer records in the database.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Protect Customer Records from Unauthorized Access

text: Only administrators can activate a pre-paid card.

text: Only authorized personnel can access sales information.

**Description**: As an organization, we must ensure that access to sales information is restricted only to authorized personnel to uphold privacy, trust, and responsibility. This measure will protect sensitive data, maintain user confidentiality, and build trust in our data handling practices.

text: The website shall prevent its data from being corrupted when incorrect data is entered in.
ethical_us:

text: The website shall protect itself from intentional abuse  and notify the administrator at all occurrences.
ethical_us:

**Description**: As a responsible and transparent organization, we need to implement measures that safeguard the website from intentional abuse, including tracking and responding to such incidents in real-time. The system should promptly notify administrators of any occurrences to maintain system integrity and security while being accountable for addressing potential abuses responsibly. This approach will uphold non-maleficence by preventing harm, enhance trustworthiness by ensuring robust protection, and uphold responsibility through transparent reporting mechanisms.

text: Data integrity scripts will be run on a weekly basis to verify the integrity of the database.

text: All customer information will be stored on a secure database  accessible only to authorized personnel.

This will protect customers' privacy and build trust by demonstrating our commitment to safeguarding their personal data and respecting their dignity.

text: The streaming server will have anti-virus software to prevent infection of malicious viruses.

text: The product shall simulate the look of ships at sea.

text: The product shall display each type of ship in a grid using an image of the specific type of ship.

text: When the offensive player takes a shot  the product shall simulate the sound of a ship at sea.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Simulation of Sound 

**Description**: As a responsible developer, I want to ensure that when the offensive player takes a shot, the product simulates the sound of a ship at sea in a manner that is respectful to users' auditory experiences and cultural contexts, to promote non-maleficence and dignity. The simulation should be transparent, ensuring that users understand when and why the sound will play, maintaining trust in the application. Additionally, special consideration should be given to avoid perpetuating stereotypes or evoking historical traumas associated with maritime sounds, thereby ensuring fairness and justice.

text: When a shot is marked as a miss  the product shall simulate the sound of a shot missing its target.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Simulation of Missed Shot Sound

**Description**: As a responsible development team, we want to ensure that the simulation of a missed shot, triggered when a shot is marked as a miss, is conducted in a way that respects user sensibilities and upholds ethical standards, avoiding causing unnecessary stress or discomfort, in order to do no harm (Non-maleficence). We shall ensure transparency in how these sounds are designed and implemented, and maintain user autonomy by providing options to adjust or mute these sounds if they so choose.

text: When a shot is marked as a hit  the product shall simulate the sound of a shot hitting its target.

text: When a ship is sunk  the product shall simulate the sound of a sinking ship.

Additionally, I will ensure that the sound simulation is transparent to users, informing them in advance about the nature of the audio they might encounter.

text: The product shall be available 24 hours per day  seven days per week.

text: The response time shall be fast enough to maintain the flow of the game.  The response time shall be no more than 2 seconds for 95% of responses and no more than 4% for the remaining responses.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Fast and Reliable Response Times

**Description**: As a user, I want the response time of the game to be efficient, with 95% of responses within 2 seconds and no more than 4 seconds for the remaining, to maintain the flow and enjoyment of the game, ensuring a seamless and frustration-free experience that respects my time and autonomy.

text: The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory.  Nine out ten users shall be able to successfully complete a game with no training.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Intuitive and Self-Explanatory User Experience

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to be intuitive and self-explanatory so that I can successfully complete a game without any prior training, ensuring ease of use and reducing the potential for confusion or frustration. This promotes transparency and trust, as the product demonstrates its usability and effectiveness clearly to a majority of users.

text: The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Player Anonymity

**Description**: As a developer, I want to ensure that the product provides no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player, so that players' privacy and personal data are protected, upholding their freedom and autonomy. This measure will also foster a sense of trust among the user community by demonstrating a commitment to data security and integrity.

text: The response time shall be fast enough to maintain the flow of the game. The response time shall be no more than 2 seconds for 95% of responses and no more than 4% for the remaining responses.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Fair and Enjoyable Gameplay with Optimal Response Time

**Description**: As a game developer, I want the response time of the game to be fast enough to maintain a smooth and enjoyable flow, with 95% of responses occurring within 2 seconds and the remaining 5% within 4 seconds. This ensures that all players have a fair and equitable gaming experience, promoting justice and fairness while also building trust in the game's performance and integrity.

text: The product shall maintain a list of players.
ethical_us:

**Description**: As a user, I want the product to maintain a list of players in a way that ensures their privacy and dignity are respected by securely storing personal information, preventing unauthorized access, and providing transparency on how their data is used.

text: The product shall allow a user to identify himself or herself as a player.

**Title**: Ethical User Identification

**Description**: As a user, I should be able to identify myself as a player in a transparent and respectful manner, ensuring my privacy and autonomy are protected, fostering trust and avoiding any form of harm or discrimination. This functionality should be implemented with integrity and accountability, prioritizing both the user's dignity and societal benefit.

text: Once a game has been initiated  the product shall make the players assigned to the game unavailable for selection from the list of players.
