**Description**: Implement a system that allows only authorized users to access the corporate Intranet from non-company locations, ensuring the privacy and security of corporate data while maintaining the integrity and trust of the organization.

text: Programmers and application developers will have access to source code to address bugs or system enhancements as deemed necessary. Network Administrator and DBA support is also required to maintain a 24x7 system uptime.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Access and System Integrity for Continuous Improvement 

**Description**: As part of ensuring system integrity and high availability, programmers, application developers, network administrators, and database administrators (DBAs) will have secure and accountable access to source code. This enables them to address bugs or implement system enhancements as necessary, while maintaining a dedicated 24x7 support system. This approach ensures transparency of operations, upholds responsibility and trust through secure access and rigorous accountability, and supports non-maleficence by preventing disruptions and potential harm.

text: System security and access levels are provided in the online system. There are varying levels of system access and functional authority. Each student’s access is limited to his/her own registration records. Only authorized system administrator(s) has access to all student registration records.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Secure and Controlled Access to Student Registration Records

**Description**: As a user of the online system, I want to ensure that there are varying levels of system access and functional authority, so that each student's access is limited to their own registration records while only authorized system administrators have access to all student registration records. This is to protect the privacy of personal data and maintain trust in the system by preventing unauthorized access.

text: The online registration system is “self-service style” system that shall initially address the student registration needs.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent and Responsible Student Registration

**Description**: As a student, I want the self-service online registration system to clearly explain its processes, decisions, and requirements, and ensure my registration needs are met ethically and transparently, so that I can fully understand and trust the system while maintaining control over my data and registration choices.

text: All data entry forms for the application should match their Microsoft Excel hardcopy counterparts as closely as possible. Hardcopies of these forms were provided to the design team during the second requirements interview.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Accurate and User-Friendly Data Entry Forms

**Description**: As a user, I want the data entry forms within the application to closely match their corresponding Microsoft Excel hardcopy counterparts. This ensures that data is entered accurately and efficiently, fostering trust and minimizing potential errors, ultimately contributing to the transparency and understandability of the process.

text: 95% of users will not need to read the user manual to be able to use the application.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Intuitive Usability

**Description**: Design the application interface to be highly intuitive and user-friendly so that 95% of users can use it effectively without the need to read the user manual, thereby respecting users' autonomy and dignity by valuing their time and cognitive load.

text: Changes made to the Manage My ID website can be adopted without altering the iOS application.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Compatibility and Integrity Across Platforms

**Description**: As a developer, I want changes made to the Manage My ID website to be seamlessly adopted without altering the iOS application, to ensure that user experience, trust, and the integrity of the service are maintained across all platforms. This ensures that users' freedom and autonomy are respected, and that the system's reliability and trustworthiness remain intact.

text: The application should be connected to the Internet.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Secure Internet Connectivity for the Application

**Description**: As a developer, I want the application's internet connectivity to be secure and transparent, ensuring that data transmissions respect user privacy and prevent potential harm. This will build users' trust, protect their autonomy, and uphold justice and fairness by guaranteeing that no discriminatory practices are embedded in the network connections.

text: The application should be connected to the GPS device.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Respect for User Autonomy in GPS Connectivity

**Description**: As a user, I want the application to connect to the GPS device only with my explicit consent and understanding of how location data will be used, ensuring that my autonomy and privacy are respected and maintained.

text: The application should be easy to extend. The code should be written in a way that it favors implementation of new functions.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Application Should Support Extendibility in an Ethical Manner  
**Description**: As a user, I want the application's code to be written and organized for easy extension, ensuring that any new functionality can be added transparently and responsibly, without compromising user privacy, security, or the inherent rights and dignity of individuals.

text: Test environments should be built for the application to allow testing of the applications different functions.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Ethical Testing Environments

**Description**: As a developer, I want to build test environments for the application that adhere to ethical principles, ensuring that these environments are transparent, secure, and privacy-preserving, so that we can responsibly verify the application's functions without harming users or compromising their data.

text: The application should be portable with iOS and Android.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Cross-Platform Accessibility and Usability

**Description**: As a developer, I want to make sure the application is portable on both iOS and Android platforms to ensure equal access and usability for all users, promoting the principles of justice and fairness by preventing discrimination against users based on their choice of mobile operating system.

text: The system shall show a tabbed display (or equivalent functionality) with the campus map on one tab and info on the most recently announced building on the other.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Inclusive and Transparent Campus Information Display

**Description**: As a user, I want a tabbed display that includes a campus map and information on the most recently announced building to be presented in a clear, accessible, and transparent manner. This ensures that all users, regardless of their background or abilities, have equal access to important information about the campus. The information should be regularly updated and communicated effectively to maintain trust and provide a fair and just user experience.

text: The system shall allow the user to scroll the campus map from the campus map tab.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent and User-Friendly Campus Map Navigation

**Description**: As a user, I want to be able to scroll the campus map from the campus map tab in a clear and transparent manner, ensuring that navigation is straightforward, understandable, and effectively communicated, so I can browse the map with ease and confidence.

text: The campus map shall provide visual clues regarding what areas have prepared audio and therefore may be selected.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Visual Indicators for Accessible Audio Features  
**Description**: As a user, I want the campus map to provide clear visual indicators for areas that have prepared audio features, ensuring that I can easily identify and utilize these accessible resources without any confusion or unnecessary effort.

text: The campus map shall have a pause/resume button. The pause and resume button will allow the user to scroll and select other buildings without being interrupted by the automatic search and announce feature.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Enable User-Controlled Navigation on Campus Map 

**Description**: As an application developer, I want to implement a pause/resume button on the campus map feature, ensuring that users can navigate and select buildings without automatic interruptions. This enhancement respects user autonomy (Freedom and autonomy), ensures user trust by providing a reliable and understandable interface (Trust), and promotes user satisfaction by facilitating a smoother interaction with the map, hence doing good (Beneficence).

text: The system shall provide a way to return to the startup screen.
ethical_us:
**Title**: System Allows Transparent Navigation Back to Startup Screen

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to provide a clear and easily accessible way to return to the startup screen so that I can navigate the application with transparency and autonomy, ensuring that my interactions with the system are straightforward and my usage experience is respectful of my intent and understanding.

text: It should generate a report about registered complaint to the admin and response report to the user who has submitted his queries.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Handling and Reporting of User Complaints

**Description**: The system should generate a report about registered complaints to the admin, ensuring that the data is handled with transparency and integrity. Additionally, a response report should be sent to the user who submitted the queries, respecting their privacy and maintaining trust by providing clear and timely feedback. The system should ensure that no harm is done to the users, their freedom and autonomy are preserved, and any action taken is fair and just.

text: The system should maintain correct schedules of labs and the documentation of all the lab equipment.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Accurate and Transparent Lab Schedules and Equipment Documentation

**Description**: As a responsible developer, I want the system to maintain correct schedules of labs and accurate documentation of all lab equipment in a transparent manner to ensure that all stakeholders have access to reliable and understandable information, thereby promoting trust and accountability. This aligns with the ethical principles of transparency, responsibility, and trust.

text: The system should use the company colors and logos.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Brand Consistency with Ethical Considerations

**Description**: As a developer, I want to ensure that the system uses the company colors and logos in a transparent and responsible manner, so that the branding is consistent and trustworthy while respecting the ethical principles of the organization.

text: The system shall be capable of restoring itself to its previous state in the event of failure (e.g. a system crash or power loss).
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure System Self-Restoration for Reliability and Trust

**Description**: In the event of a system failure, such as a crash or power loss, the system shall have the capability to restore itself to its previous state. This ensures reliability, minimizes disruptions, and maintains user trust by demonstrating a commitment to robust and dependable performance.

text: The system shall be able to display a menu at all times to facilitate manual order taking should the need arise.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Accessibility to Manual Order-Taking Menu

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to display a menu at all times to facilitate manual order-taking, ensuring that the system respects user autonomy and provides a reliable fallback option to avoid potential harm from system failures. This approach enhances transparency by providing clear options and promotes trust by ensuring the system's reliability in different scenarios.

text: The system shall utilise periodic 30-second keep-alive messages between tablets and the server to monitor tablet operational status.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Monitoring for Tablet Operational Status  

**Description**: As a developer, I want to ensure transparency and trust by implementing periodic 30-second keep-alive messages between tablets and the server, so that the operational status of the tablets can be monitored without compromising user privacy and autonomy.

text: The system shall flag tablets that fail to send timely keep-alive messages as non-operational and disassociate the assigned waiter from the tablet.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Reliable Tablet Operation to Uphold Service Standards 

**Description**: As a restaurant owner, I want the system to flag tablets that fail to send timely keep-alive messages as non-operational and automatically disassociate the assigned waiter from the tablet. This ensures transparency in our service process and upholds the integrity of our operations by preventing disruptions that could harm the dining experience of our customers. This also reduces unnecessary stress on the waiters, promoting their well-being and dignity.

text: A waiter password used for tablet login must have a bit-strength of at least 64 bits.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Strong Password Encryption for Waiter Tablet Login

**Description**: As an organization, we must ensure that the password used for waiter tablet login meets a bit-strength of at least 64 bits to protect sensitive data and maintain the privacy and security of our users.

text: A waiter password used for tablet login must be changed every three months.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Regular Password Updates for Enhanced Security

**Description**: As a system administrator, I want the waiter's tablet login password to be changed every three months to ensure that access remains secure, thereby upholding user trust and protecting sensitive data.

text: A waiter shall only be able to log into one tablet at any given instance of time.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Restrict Waiter's Login to a Single Device 

**Description**: As a restaurant administration system, I want to ensure that each waiter can only log into one tablet at a time in order to protect the security and privacy of user data, enhance system integrity, and reduce potential data breaches, thereby fostering trust and responsibility within the service environment.

text: A waiter that attempts to log into a second tablet while already logged into another tablet shall be rejected and notified through both tablets.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Prevent Multiple Logins for Enhanced Security and Accountability

**Description**: To ensure the security and integrity of the system, as well as to maintain accountability, a waiter attempting to log into a second tablet while already logged into another tablet will be rejected and notified through both tablets. This measure helps to protect sensitive information and prevent misuse, thereby fostering a trustworthy and secure environment for both employees and customers.

text: A display shall not require a user to log in.
ethical_us:
**Title**: User-Friendly Access without Mandatory Login

**Description**: As a user, I want to access basic information or services from the display without being required to log in. This ensures my autonomy and privacy are respected, making the system more transparent and trustworthy.

text: A surface computer shall not require a user to log in.
ethical_us:
**Title**: User Access Without Compulsory Login

**Description**: As a user, I want to access the surface computer without mandatory login so that my autonomy and ease of use are respected, and my privacy is protected without compromising the security and effectiveness of my interactions.

text: A tablet shall require a user to log in using a username and password.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure Authentication for User Access

**Description**: In order to protect the privacy and trust of users, the tablet shall require users to log in using a username and password, ensuring that personal data and access are secure and that unauthorized access is prevented.

text: The system will fully function in major browsers.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Cross-Browser Compatibility for Equal Access

**Description**: As an ethically responsible developer, I want the system to fully function in major browsers to ensure justice and fairness. By providing equal access to all users regardless of their choice of browser, we uphold the principles of dignity and autonomy, allowing everyone to freely choose their preferred web platform without facing usability issues. This inclusivity also helps build trust and ensures that the system benefits the broadest possible audience.

text: The system will support mobile users in some way.
ethical_us:
**Title**: The system will provide mobile support without compromising user privacy 

**Description**: As a mobile user, I want the system to support my access while ensuring that my personal data is protected, so that my privacy is not compromised while using the system on a mobile device.

text: Responses to view information shall take no longer than 5 seconds to appear on the screen.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Timely Access to Information  
**Description**: As a user, I want information to be displayed on the screen within 5 seconds, ensuring timely access to information, fostering trust and accountability, and preventing any form of stress or inconvenience caused by delays. This aligns with the principles of transparency, responsibility, and trust, enabling users to have a seamless and reliable experience.

text: The system shall accommodate large data items without fault.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Robust Data Handling Without Compromising System Integrity

**Description**: As a system user, I want the system to accommodate large data items reliably so that it maintains its functionality and safeguards data integrity, ensuring non-maleficence by preventing data loss or corruption, and upholding trust by consistently performing as expected.

text: System will use secured database.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure Data Storage for User Trust and Privacy

**Description**: As a developer, I want the system to use a secured database so that users' personal data is protected from unauthorized access, ensuring their privacy and building their trust in the system. This helps in complying with privacy regulations and instills confidence among users that their data is handled responsibly and securely.

text: Unauthorised users can only read data without modifying anything.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Unauthorized Read-Only Data Access

**Description**: Ensuring that unauthorized users are only permitted to read data without the ability to modify anything helps maintain the integrity and security of the system. This aligns with ethical principles of privacy by protecting data from unauthorized alterations, non-maleficence by preventing potential harmful changes, and trust by safeguarding the system's reliability and accuracy.

text: ABS shall handle all expected and unexpected errors in ways that prevent loss in information and long downtime period.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Error Handling for Information Preservation and Operational Continuity

**Description**: As a user of the Automated Banking System (ABS), I want the system to handle all expected and unexpected errors in ways that prevent loss of information and minimize downtime, so that my data is secure and available, thereby ensuring trust and non-maleficence.

text: Authenticate and Login user to the web app.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Authentication and Login

**Description**: As a web app developer, I want to implement an authentication and login system that ensures user privacy by securely handling personal data, maintains transparency about data usage, and provides a user-friendly and understandable interface to foster user trust. This system must prevent unauthorized access, be free from unfair biases, and contribute to a positive user experience without compromising their dignity or freedom.

text: Enable new users to register to the tech support system.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical User Registration Process for Tech Support System 

**Description**: As a new user, I want to register for the tech support system in a transparent, secure, and fair manner, ensuring that my personal data is protected, my autonomy and freedom are respected, and the process benefits me by providing seamless access to tech support services, thereby building trust and upholding my dignity.

text: Enable a registered user to change his password if he forgets his password.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Allow Registered Users to Securely Change Forgotten Passwords 

**Description**: As a registered user who has forgotten their password, I want a secure and transparent process to reset my password, so that my privacy and personal data are protected and I can regain access to my account without compromising security or trust.

text: Enable a registered user to view his profile. Additional information viz. questions asked by him and answers posted by him are also displayed.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Registered User Profile Transparency

**Description**: As a registered user, I want to be able to view my profile, including all the questions I have asked and the answers I have posted, ensuring transparency and allowing me to manage my information responsibly. This feature should respect my privacy while fostering trust and encouraging autonomous management of my profile.

text: Enable a user to view questions and their corresponding answers.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Access to Q&A Information

**Description**: As a user, I want to view questions and their corresponding answers to gain information transparently and ensure that the information provided respects my privacy, maintains trust, and upholds justice and fairness by presenting accurate and unbiased content.

text: Enable a logged in user to ask questions.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Enable Transparent, Fair, and Autonomous Question Submission for Logged-in Users

**Description**: As a logged-in user, I want to ask questions with the assurance that my queries will be handled transparently, fairly, and by respecting my autonomy, so that I can trust the system to provide unbiased and accurate responses while safeguarding my rights.

text: Enable a logged in user to post answers.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Ethical Posting of Answers by Logged-in Users

**Description**: As a logged-in user, I want to post answers transparently and responsibly, ensuring my actions do not cause harm, preserve the privacy of all parties involved, and contribute positively to the community. This feature should promote fairness and respect for human dignity, enabling users to express their autonomy while maintaining trust and sustainability in the platform.

text: Enable a logged in user to up vote and down vote answers.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Fair Voting Mechanism for Answers 

**Description**: As a developer, I want to implement a voting mechanism for logged-in users to upvote or downvote answers, ensuring that the process is transparent, fair, and respects user privacy. The system should be designed to prevent manipulation, thus upholding justice and fairness, while maintaining user trust and autonomy by allowing them to express their opinions freely and ethically.

text: Provide an interface for the admin to approve posts so that posts are not visible without admin approval.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Admin Post Approval Interface for Ensuring Non-maleficence and Trust

**Description**: Develop an interface for administrators to review and approve user-generated posts before they become visible to ensure the content adheres to community guidelines, thereby preventing harm and fostering trust within the user community by ensuring inappropriate content is not displayed.

text: Enable the admin to generate reports which contains all the posts and their corresponding replies.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent and Responsible Reporting System

**Description**: As an admin, I want to generate comprehensive reports that include all posts and their corresponding replies, ensuring that the data is transparent and easily understandable. This will also allow for accountability and integrity in tracking interactions, while maintaining user trust through accurate and responsible data handling.

text: Information transmission should be securely transmitted to server without any changes in information.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure and Accurate Information Transmission

**Description**: Ensure that all information transmitted to the server is securely encrypted to prevent unauthorized access and is accurately maintained without any alterations, thereby upholding the principles of privacy, integrity, and trust.

text: Be intuitive even to first time users
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Intuitiveness for First-Time Users
**Description**: As a system designer, I want to create an interface that is intuitive and easy to navigate for first-time users so that they can use the AI without frustration, ensuring transparency, fostering trust, and upholding user dignity.

text: Flea Market system will interface with the web server and RDBMS software using APIs provided by the implementation language
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent and Secure Interfacing for Flea Market System

**Description**: As a developer, I want the Flea Market system to interface transparently and securely with the web server and RDBMS software using the appropriate APIs provided by the implementation language, so that all data transactions are clear, understandable, and secure. This will uphold the principles of transparency, trust, responsibility, and privacy, ensuring that users' data is handled in a trustworthy and ethical manner.

text: All transactions at the Flea Market require a valid user ID and password.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Secure and Trustworthy Transaction Authentication at the Flea Market  

**Description**: As a flea market operator, I want all transactions to require a valid user ID and password so that I can uphold the principles of Privacy, Trust, and Responsibility, ensuring all participants' data is secure and only authorized individuals can engage in transactions.

text: Secure data transfer over the Internet could be provided using SSL encryption that will be configured by the host system administrator.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure Data Transfer over the Internet with SSL Encryption 

**Description**: As a host system administrator, I want to configure SSL encryption to secure data transfer over the Internet, so that users' privacy is protected and their trust in the system's ability to keep their data safe is enhanced. This ensures that their data is handled responsibly and aligns with ethical principles of privacy, responsibility, and trust.

text: The IP addresses where the transaction was made from will be logged.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Ethical Handling of Logged IP Addresses  

**Description**: As a developer, I want the system to log IP addresses where the transactions are made from in a way that respects user privacy, ensures data protection, and maintains user trust. This involves encrypting the IP addresses, minimizing data retention periods, and clearly communicating to users why their IP addresses are being logged, ensuring transparency and maintaining their autonomy.

text: User passwords will be stored in the database in an encrypted format.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure Storage of User Passwords

**Description**: As a system developer, I want user passwords to be stored in the database in an encrypted format to ensure privacy, maintain trust, and protect users' data from unauthorized access, thereby avoiding potential harm and maintaining individuals' dignity.

text: Most of the system functions will be controlled using the administrative interface.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Administration of System Functions 

**Description**: As an administrator, I want the administrative interface to be transparent, secure, and easily understandable, ensuring that system functions are controlled responsibly and without compromising user privacy or autonomy, to maintain trust and uphold the principle of non-maleficence while benefiting all users equitably.

text: Detailed documentation of the code and SRS will enable easy maintenance of the Flea Market.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent and Maintainable Code and SRS

**Description**: As a software developer, I want to provide detailed documentation of the code and Software Requirements Specification (SRS) for the Flea Market application, so that the maintenance team can easily understand, manage, and update the system. This will uphold the principle of transparency by making the technology understandable and ensuring all processes are clearly communicated, thereby fostering trust among all stakeholders.

text: Information recorded must include an optional field for context.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Offer Optional Context Field for Recorded Information

**Description**: As a system designer, I need to ensure that the information recorded includes an optional field for context, so that users can provide additional details if they choose, promoting transparency and supporting users' autonomy in controlling how much information they share.

text: Information should be tagged according to who is entering the data.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Tagging Information by Data Contributor

**Description**: As a system, I must tag information with the identity of the data contributor to ensure transparency and accountability, allowing for traceability and integrity in data handling and processing. This will help maintain trust and responsibility by clearly identifying sources of information.

text: It must be able to download the most recent medical record.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Access to Recent Medical Records

**Description**: As a user, I need the system to download the most recent medical record while ensuring that my privacy is maintained, my data is protected, and access is granted transparently, ensuring that my dignity and autonomy are respected.

text: It must store the most recent copy of information in its application data folder.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Up-to-Date Data Storage

**Description**: As a developer, I want to ensure that the application stores the most recent copy of information in its data folder to maintain transparency and trust, ensuring users have access to the latest accurate information.

text: It must only update the parts that have changed when connecting to the server.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Efficient Data Synchronization to Support Privacy and Sustainability

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to update only the parts that have changed when connecting to the server, to ensure efficient use of resources, safeguard my privacy by transmitting minimal data, and contribute to sustainability by reducing unnecessary data transfer.

text: It must be able to change and update information on the server.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Management of Data Updates

**Description**: As a responsible AI system, it must be able to change and update information on the server in a transparent and ethical manner, ensuring data privacy, security, and accuracy while respecting user autonomy and maintaining system trustworthiness.

text: The application must log the user out when it is exited.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring User Privacy through Auto-Logout

**Description**: As a user, I want the application to automatically log me out when it is exited, to ensure that my personal data is protected and my privacy is maintained.

text: A correct combination of username and password is required for a user to login.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure and Confidential User Authentication

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to require a correct combination of username and password for login, ensuring my personal data is kept private and secure (Privacy), thereby maintaining trust in the system’s ability to protect my information (Trust), and preventing unauthorized access that could lead to potential harm (Non-maleficence).

text: It should give a drill-down view of all data in the medical record after logging in.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Ethical Display of Medical Records

**Description**: As a responsible system, it should provide healthcare professionals with a detailed view of a patient's medical records after logging in, ensuring transparency and maintainability. However, this access must be carefully controlled to respect the patient's privacy, protect their dignity, and maintain trust. Only authorised medical personnel should access the entire medical record to ensure the data is used beneficently and does not cause harm.

text: The user must be able to set an option to hide information based on who has tagged it.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Enable Users to Hide Information Based on Tagger Identity

**Description**: As a user, I want the ability to hide information based on who tagged it, to ensure my privacy and freedom and autonomy in managing shared content. This empowers users to control their exposure to specific individuals' contributions, maintaining a respectful and dignified use of personal data.

text: The user must be able to add photos from his/her photo library to his/her medical record.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure Photo Integration for Medical Records

**Description**: As a user, I want to be able to add photos from my photo library to my medical record in a manner that ensures the privacy of my personal data, maintains the security and integrity of my medical information, and respects my autonomy and dignity. This functionality should ensure transparency in how my data is used and be built to prevent any potential harm or misuse of my photos.

text: It must allow a user to login.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical User Login

**Description**: The system must allow a user to login in a manner that ensures their privacy, protects their personal data, and maintains transparency about how their information is used. The login process should be secure to build trust and ensure non-maleficence by preventing unauthorized access. Additionally, it should be designed to be accessible to all users fairly, respecting their dignity and autonomy.

text: It must allow a user to logout.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring User Autonomy Through Logout Functionality

**Description**: The system must enable users to logout at any time, providing them with the autonomy and freedom to manage their own session. This ensures user privacy is respected and supports a trustworthy and transparent user experience by allowing users control over their personal data and session activities.

text: All information must be viewable on the website.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparency of Information on the Website

**Description**: As a user, I want all information to be clearly viewable on the website to ensure transparency, enabling me to fully understand the services, terms, and policies offered by the organisation.

text: All information must be updatable on the website.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Updatable Information on the Website

**Description**: As an ethical engineer, I want all information on the website to be easily updatable to maintain transparency and accuracy, ensuring users have access to the most current and correct data.

text: It must allow a user to download a backup of their medical information.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Allow User to Download Medical Information Backup

**Description**: Implement a feature that enables users to download a backup of their medical information. This aligns with ethical principles by ensuring transparency, respecting privacy, and empowering users with control over their personal health data, thereby upholding their dignity and autonomy.

text: Logout must be automatic after 1 hour of inactivity.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Automatic Logout for Idle Users

**Description**: To ensure users' privacy and data security, the system must automatically log out users after 1 hour of inactivity. This helps protect sensitive information from unauthorized access and aligns with principles of privacy and trust by safeguarding user data, and ensuring system integrity and accountability.

text: Full data backups must be created daily.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Daily Data Backups for Privacy and Trust

**Description**: As a system administrator, I want to create full data backups daily to ensure user data is securely stored and protected, thus maintaining user privacy and trust.

text: A user must be logged on to be able to view or edit any medical information.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure User Authentication for Access to Medical Information 

**Description**: As an application, I must require users to be logged on before they can view or edit any medical information, to ensure privacy and protect personal health data from unauthorized access, thus maintaining trust and responsibility.

text: Each account must securely store all of its data.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Secure Data Storage for User Accounts

**Description**: As a developer, I want the system to securely store all user account data, so that the privacy and trust of users are maintained in accordance with ethical standards. This ensures that individual privacy is protected, and user trust in the system is upheld.

text: Each account must have a separate identifying account number.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Unique Account Identification for User Privacy and Responsibility

**Description**: As a responsible developer, ensure that each user account has a distinct and separate identifying account number to protect user privacy, prevent data breaches, and uphold accountability.

text: The system shall allow user to choose filling that they want.
ethical_us:
**Title**: **User Autonomy in Decision-Making** 

**Description**: The system shall enable users to choose the filling they prefer, thereby respecting their autonomy and freedom of choice. This ensures that the user has control over their preferences and reinforces trust in the system by honoring individual decision-making rights.

text: The system shall allow user to choose their preferable topping.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Freedom of Choice for Toppings 

**Description**: Ensure that the system allows users to freely choose their preferred toppings, respecting their autonomy and personal preferences without any constraints, thereby enhancing their sense of freedom and personal decision-making in the user experience.

text: The system shall allow user to decorate their doughnut.
ethical_us:
**Title**: User-Centered Customization of Doughnuts

**Description**: As a user, I want to decorate my doughnut while ensuring that my choices are respected and that the customization process is transparent, fair, and respects my freedom and privacy. The system should enable me to confidently personalize my doughnut without concerns about data misuse or discrimination, thereby enhancing my trust and satisfaction with the service.

text: The system shall give the user an opportunity for the user to choose the selection of doughnut provided.
ethical_us:
**Title**: User Choice in Doughnut Selection

**Description**: As a user, I want the ability to choose my preferred doughnut selection to ensure that my autonomy and personal preferences are respected, promoting freedom of choice and enhancing user satisfaction.

text: The system should take the customer name.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Respect for Customer Privacy When Collecting Personal Information
**Description**: As a system developer, I want to ensure that the collection of customer names is done with explicit consent and stored securely, so that customer privacy is protected and their data is not misused.

text: The system should keep the customer contact number.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Privacy and Security for Customer Contact Numbers

**Description**: As a responsible developer, I want the system to securely store the customer's contact number, ensuring it is protected from unauthorized access and misuse, to uphold their right to privacy and maintain their trust.

text: The system should keep the customer email.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Protect Customer's Email Privacy

**Description**: As a system, I want to ensure that the customer's email is stored securely and used only for its intended purpose, so that the customer's privacy is respected and their data remains confidential.

text: The system should ask the user to key in the pickup date.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure User Autonomy in Pickup Date Selection

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to allow me to key in the pickup date so that I can exercise my freedom and autonomy in choosing a date that best fits my schedule, ensuring that my personal preferences and circumstances are respected.

text: The system should require the user to state time when should the doughnut be delivered.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Timing Transparency for Doughnut Delivery

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to clearly require me to specify the exact time for doughnut delivery, so I have control over when my order arrives and to foster transparency and trust in the delivery process. This ensures my autonomy and prevents any inconvenience due to unexpected delivery times.

text: The system should have to keep the location where the doughnut will be send.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Privacy When Storing and Using Location Data for Doughnut Delivery

**Description**: As a system user, I want my location data to be stored and used securely and responsibly, ensuring my privacy is respected and protected while delivering doughnuts.

text: The website is available whenever the users want to use it.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Continuous Availability of the Website

**Description**: As a user, I want the website to be available whenever I need to use it, to ensure trust, beneficence, and fairness by providing consistent and reliable access to information and services.

text: The system use SSL (secured socket layer) in all transactions that include any confidential customer information.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Secure Communication Channels for Customer Information

**Description**: As a company committed to protecting customer privacy and building trust, we will implement SSL (Secure Socket Layer) in all transactions involving confidential customer information. This will encrypt data during transmission, ensuring that sensitive details are protected from unauthorized access and potential breaches.

text: The system must automatically log out all customers after a period of inactivity.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Automatic Customer Logout for Inactivity

**Description**: To protect customer privacy and enhance data security, the system should automatically log out users after a specified period of inactivity. This measure will prevent unauthorized access to personal information and uphold the principle of non-maleficence by reducing potential harm from unattended sessions. By ensuring that user data remains secure and inaccessible after a period of non-use, the system also reinforces trust and responsibility in the eyes of the customers.

text: The system should not leave any cookies on the customer’s computer containing the user’s password.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure Handling of Customer Passwords

**Description**: As a responsible and privacy-focused organization, we ensure that the system does not leave any cookies on the customer's computer containing the user's password. This protects the user's privacy and ensures data security, thereby upholding ethical principles of privacy, non-maleficence, and trust.

text: The system’s back-end servers shall only be accessible to authenticated administrators.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure Access Control for Back-End Servers

**Description**: As a system, I will ensure that only authenticated administrators can access the back-end servers to protect sensitive data and maintain user privacy, thus promoting trust and responsibility.

text: Sensitive data will be encrypted before being sent over insecure connections like the internet.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Encrypt Sensitive Data Before Transmission

**Description**: As a developer, I want to ensure that all sensitive data is encrypted before being sent over insecure connections like the internet, to protect individuals' privacy and maintain their trust in our system.

text: The system provides storage of all databases on redundant computers with automatic switchover.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Data Redundancy and Reliability

**Description**: As a system user, I want the system to provide storage of all databases on redundant computers with automatic switchover so that I can trust that my data is consistently available and secure, thereby promoting trust and protecting my information.

text: The reliability of the overall program depends on the reliability of the separate components. The main pillar of reliability of the system is the backup of the database which is continuously maintained and updated to reflect the most recent changes.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Continuous Database Backup for System Reliability

**Description**: As part of our commitment to trust and transparency, we must ensure that the reliability of our overall program is supported by maintaining and updating the database backup continuously. This practice safeguards data integrity and reflects the most recent changes, ensuring that users can trust the system to function correctly and restore data accurately in the event of a failure.

text: An end-user may use this system on any OS
ethical_us:
**Title**: Cross-Platform Accessibility 

**Description**: As an end-user, I want to be able to use this system on any operating system, ensuring it is accessible and fair to all users regardless of their OS preference, thus respecting the principles of justice and fairness as well as promoting freedom and autonomy.

text: The logo and the current basic design of registration system should be displayed. The system should be attractive according to the clients. The design and the color should make users feel comfortable when using the system instead of flashing useless colors on the screen. The design should also reflect the seriousness of the environment.
ethical_us:
**Title**:  Ensuring User Comfort and Seriousness in Design

**Description**: As a user, I want the registration system to display the logo and the current basic design while ensuring the overall appearance is attractive and comfortable. The design should avoid flashing useless colors to respect users' visual comfort and reflect the seriousness of the environment. This maintains a professional and user-friendly experience, respecting user dignity and promoting trust.

text: The system should be able to manage all the information incoming from the database and the catalogue.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Management of Information from Database and Catalogue

**Description**: As a system, I must manage all incoming information from the database and catalogue in a manner that ensures transparency, non-maleficence, privacy, and justice and fairness. This includes providing clear and understandable processes, avoiding harm, protecting personal data, and ensuring unbiased data handling to build trust and maintain users' dignity and autonomy.

text: The product is Web based therefore it will be used in any environment that allows Web access.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Equitable Access to Web-Based Product 

**Description**: As a user, I want the web-based product to be accessible and usable in various environments with web access, ensuring that all individuals, regardless of their background, location, or socio-economic status, can benefit from the product. This will promote justice and fairness by providing equal opportunity for all users to utilize the product.

text: For the system to successfully operate the registration system should be integrated with other IT services and the portal.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Integration of Registration System with IT Services

**Description**: As a user, I want the registration system to be seamlessly integrated with other IT services and the portal in a way that ensures privacy, transparency, and trust. This integration should respect user autonomy, maintain data security, and operate without causing harm or unfair discrimination. The process should be explained clearly to users, ensuring their data is handled responsibly and sustainably.

text: The system should need to be entirely self-supporting since the users would be using it only to register courses.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Self-Sufficiency to Protect User Autonomy and Privacy

**Description**: As a developer, I want the system to be entirely self-supporting in order to ensure that users can register for courses without requiring additional support, thereby maintaining their autonomy and safeguarding their privacy by minimizing unnecessary interactions or data sharing.

text: The Web interface should be compatible with standards in order to be usable via all major Web browsers in a wide variety of environments.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Web Interface Compatibility and Accessibility 

**Description**: As a user, I want the web interface to be compatible with standards in order to be usable via all major web browsers in a wide variety of environments, ensuring accessibility and fairness for all users regardless of their browser choice and operating system, thus upholding principles of justice and fairness, as well as trust by providing consistent and reliable access.

text: Everyone (stakeholders and guests) can have access to the system and the catalogue. Every client must have secure and private access to his/her data. The  and the service man can have access to every part of the system. All these accesses (except the “guest tour” access) require identification through ID and password.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure and Equitable Access for All Stakeholders

**Description**: Implement a system where all stakeholders, including clients and service personnel, have secure access to the system and its catalogue. Each client must have private, secure access to their own data, safeguarded with ID and password verification. Service personnel should have comprehensive access to the system to perform their roles effectively. Guest users may access limited system tours without identification. This ensures privacy and security for individual users while maintaining the necessary operational access for service personnel, supporting principles of Privacy, Trust, Justice and Fairness, and Responsibility.

text: The system will develop a security system that will reduce to the minimum the possibility of corruption from systems and/or humans.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Implement Anti-Corruption Security System 

**Description**: Develop a security system that significantly reduces the potential for corruption by both systems and human actors, ensuring transparency and accountability. Ensure that the system is robust, has clear audit trails, and includes features that track and report on activities to uphold the integrity and trustworthiness of the platform. The system will aim to prevent unethical behavior, providing safeguards against data misuse and protecting the dignity and rights of all users involved.

text: The Operational Interface shall have a Mean Time Between Failures of no less than 7 days.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure High Reliability of Operational Interface

**Description**: As a responsibility-driven development team, we ensure that the Operational Interface meets a Mean Time Between Failures (MTBF) of no less than 7 days to maintain trust and provide a reliable user experience, thereby minimizing disruptions and potential harm to the user's work process.

text: The system shall be available 99.5% of the time.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure System Reliability and Availability

**Description**: As a user, I need the system to be available 99.5% of the time to build trust and ensure consistent access to services, thereby respecting user autonomy and minimizing potential disruptions that could cause harm.

text: The software system needs a robust security mechanism in place so that unauthorized users are not allowed access to parts of the system.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Robust Security to Protect User Data from Unauthorized Access  
**Description**: As an ethical developer, I want the software system to implement a robust security mechanism so that unauthorized users cannot access sensitive parts of the system, ensuring user privacy, maintaining trust, and upholding justice and fairness by protecting against security breaches.

text: Each user shall either be trusted or not trusted.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent and Fair Trust Determination

**Description**: As a developer, I want the system to employ transparent and fair criteria when determining if a user is either trusted or not trusted, ensuring that the decision-making process is clear, understandable, and free from biases, thereby promoting justice, fairness, and trustworthiness among users.

text: All source code and development related documents shall be controlled under a version control system.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Version Control for Source Code and Development Documents

**Description**: As a development team, we need to control all source code and development-related documents under a version control system to ensure transparency, accountability, and the ability to trace changes. This practice not only promotes trust among stakeholders by providing a clear audit trail but also upholds responsibility by allowing us to track contributions and modifications, ensuring that no harm is done to the integrity of the project.

text: All source code shall adhere to an agreed upon and well-defined set of coding standards for each development language used.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Source Code Quality and Clarity

**Description**: As a developer, I want all source code to adhere to an agreed upon and well-defined set of coding standards for each development language used, so that the software is transparent, maintainable, and trustworthy, ensuring it is understandable and can be reliably audited to avoid potential harm and foster responsibility and accountability among team members.

text: Since the software must run on several popular hardware platforms and the goal is to achieve a reasonable level of platform independence.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Platform Independence for Inclusive Access

**Description**: Ensure that the software is designed to operate efficiently across various popular hardware platforms, thereby promoting inclusivity and equal access for users irrespective of the hardware they possess. This approach aligns with the principles of justice and fairness, as it prevents discrimination based on users' hardware capabilities, and beneficence, as it aims to provide equal benefits to a wider user base.

text: High level of performance requires high speed network and high level of connectivity.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring High Connectivity and Speed with Ethical Considerations

**Description**: As a developer, I want to ensure that high levels of performance, network speed, and connectivity do not compromise user privacy or data security, so that user trust is maintained, and the system operates responsibly and transparently.

text: The available server must be reliable and the network connectivity in the supermarket should be proper for smooth flow of all operations and data.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Reliability and Connectivity for Smooth Operations

**Description**: To uphold the principles of trust and non-maleficence, it is essential that the server reliability and network connectivity in the supermarket are maintained to ensure smooth and uninterrupted operations. This not only prevents potential disruptions and data loss, but also builds customer trust by ensuring a seamless shopping experience. Reliable infrastructure minimizes harm caused by potential downtime and supports the dignity of employees by providing them with stable tools to perform their duties efficiently.

text: Every user of the software is provided a unique login ID and a password which is stored in the database hashed by SHA2 algorithm.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure User Authentication and Privacy Protection

**Description**: As a user of the software, I want to be provided with a unique login ID and a password that is securely stored in the database using the SHA2 hashing algorithm, to ensure my privacy and personal data security.

text: The software is available for use from the supermarket opening time to the closing time.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Equal Access to Software During Supermarket Hours

**Description**: As a software developer, I want to ensure the software is available for use from the supermarket's opening time to its closing time, so that all customers have equal access to the service throughout the operational hours, thereby promoting justice and fairness and building trust.

text: The system shall accommodate high number of items and users without any fault.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Robust and Scalable System Infrastructure

**Description**: As a developer, I want to ensure that the system can accommodate a high number of items and users without any faults, to maintain trust and reliability, and to avoid any disturbances that might harm the user experience.

text: System will use secured database
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Database Security 

**Description**: As a developer, I will implement robust security measures for the database to ensure user data is protected and privacy is maintained, thereby fostering trust and responsibility while preventing potential harm.

text: Normal users can just read information but they cannot edit or modify anything except their personal and some other information.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Minimized Data Modification Rights for Normal Users

**Description**: As a responsible software provider, we want to ensure that normal users have read-only access to most information while only allowing them to edit their personal information and limited other data. This maintains data integrity, minimizes potential harm, respects user privacy, and promotes trust by preventing unauthorized modifications.

text: System will have different types of users and every user has access constraints.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Implement User Access Control with Consideration for Privacy and Fairness

**Description**: As a system designer, I want to ensure that different types of users have appropriate access constraints, so that users' privacy is protected and access is granted in a fair and just manner. This will help prevent any unauthorized access and ensure that personal data is not mishandled, while also ensuring that access decisions are made without discrimination and are transparent to the users.

text: Control the database and keep track of all records of customers and employee details.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Ethical Management of Customer and Employee Records

**Description**: As a database administrator, I need to control the database and keep detailed records of customer and employee details while ensuring transparency, privacy, and security. This includes implementing measures to protect personal data, providing clear explanations for data usage, and maintaining accountability to avoid any harm or misuse. Additionally, I will ensure that data management follows principles of justice, fairness, and sustainability to uphold human dignity and build trust among stakeholders.

text: Contact with the vendors and give permission to sell their product under the site after testing the product’s quality.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Vendor Collaboration and Quality Assurance

**Description**: As a responsible platform, we will establish clear and transparent communication channels with vendors, ensuring that we test the quality of their products thoroughly before granting permission to sell on our site. This process will incorporate fair testing procedures, respect for vendor privacy, and a commitment to delivering only high-quality and safe products to our customers.

text: View the details of all employees and control the whole site.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Management of Employee Data Access

**Description**: As an administrator, I want to view the details of all employees and control the entire site while ensuring transparency, respecting employee privacy, and upholding justice and fairness. This involves implementing access controls and audit logs to maintain responsibility, trust, and dignity, ensuring that data access is limited only to necessary personnel and used in a manner that benefits the organization without compromising individual rights or autonomy.

text: Customers must have a valid login id to enter into the site.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Secure and Private Access for Customers

**Description**: As a system, I require customers to have a valid login ID to enter the site, ensuring that access is restricted to authorized individuals. This enhances privacy by protecting personal data, upholds trust by ensuring secure access, and maintains the responsibility of safeguarding user information.

text: New users can sign up by creating new ID.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Ethical User Signup Process

**Description**: As a product team, we want to implement a new user sign-up process that allows users to create a new ID while ensuring transparency, protecting their privacy, and respecting their autonomy. This process will include clear communication on how their data will be used, secure handling of personal information, and will be designed to prevent any forms of discrimination or unfairness. We aim to build trust with our users by creating a straightforward and ethical sign-up experience.

text: Can view all available products and can compare them and make a choice for purchasing products.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Product Comparison and Purchase

**Description**: As a user, I want to view all available products and compare them to make an informed purchasing decision in a transparent manner, ensuring my data privacy is respected. The system should present information clearly and equitably, allowing for a fair comparison of products without any hidden biases, thus enabling a responsible, autonomous, and dignified decision-making process.

text: Can purchase any product through valid credit card.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Fair and Transparent Purchase Process

**Description**: As a customer, I want the ability to purchase any product using a valid credit card, ensuring that the process is transparent, respects my privacy and personal data, prevents any potential harm (such as fraud), and upholds fairness in transaction approval irrespective of socio-economic background.

text: Can give feedback to the 24X7 Customer Care Service center about their impression for the site and services.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent and Trustworthy Customer Feedback Process

**Description**: As a user, I want to provide feedback to the 24X7 Customer Care Service center about my impressions of the site and services so that my feedback is transparently communicated and responsibly handled to improve service quality and maintain trust. The feedback process should be understandable and ensure my privacy is protected.

text: Customer must logout of the site after purchasing products.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring User Security Post-Purchase

**Description**: As a responsible e-commerce platform, after a customer completes a purchase, they should be automatically logged out to protect their privacy and personal data. This ensures user trust and respects their autonomy, while preventing unauthorized access to their account, thereby promoting non-maleficence. This measure helps in maintaining the security and integrity of user information, ensuring that their privacy is protected and minimising potential risks.

text: Can only visit the site without registration.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Guest Access to Website Without Registration  
**Description**: As a user, I should be able to visit and navigate the website without being required to register, ensuring my freedom and autonomy to access information without compromising privacy or facing unnecessary barriers.

text: Vendors must take permission from the Administrator for selling their products under the site. Administrator will test product’s quality according to its market price to permit vendor for selling purpose.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Vendor Permission and Product Quality Assurance

**Description**: As an Administrator, I need to ensure that vendors obtain explicit permission before selling their products on the site. This process involves evaluating the product's quality in relation to its market price to ensure fairness and trustworthiness for our users. This practice aligns with the principles of responsibility, transparency, and justice and fairness, by holding vendors accountable for the quality of their products and ensuring equitable market practices.

text: Can consult with the Administrator regarding product’s quality and advertisements.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Consultation with Administrator

**Description**: As a user, I want to consult with the Administrator regarding the product's quality and advertisements in a transparent and responsible manner, ensuring that any communication is clear, understandable, and respects my privacy. This will benefit both users and the organization by fostering trust and ensuring that feedback leads to meaningful improvements without causing harm.

text: View the personal details of the customer.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Privacy and Secure Handling of Customer Personal Details

**Description**: As a developer, I want to ensure that personal details of the customer are viewed in a secure and privacy-compliant manner, so that we protect their privacy and maintain their trust. This includes implementing robust security measures to prevent unauthorized access and providing transparency around how and why personal data is being accessed.

text: Responsible for properly allocating the selected product according to the customer’s choice and delivering product to the customer.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Responsible Allocation and Delivery of Customer-Selected Products 

**Description**: As a business, we must ensure that the customer-selected products are allocated accurately and delivered in a responsible manner to uphold trust, justice, dignity, and beneficence. This includes verifying that product selection matches customer choices, ensuring fair allocation without discrimination, and delivering products ethically without compromising customer satisfaction or privacy.

text: Keep track of each product item’s stocks for selling purpose.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Product Inventory Tracking

**Description**: As an ethical requirement, the system must transparently track and report the stock levels of each product item to ensure accuracy and reliability in information for selling purposes. It should uphold privacy by protecting any sensitive data related to inventory management, act responsibly in maintaining up-to-date and honest records, and ensure that this functionality does no harm to stakeholders affected by the inventory information. The system should promote fairness by making stock information accessible to all relevant stakeholders equally and contribute to trust by providing reliable and secure inventory tracking.

text: Responsible for informing administrator when any product item’s stock goes under the minimum level.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent and Responsible Stock Alerts

**Description**: As a store administrator, I want the system to transparently notify me when any product item’s stock goes under the minimum level, ensuring clarity and responsibility in stock management to prevent any potential issues or harm due to low stock levels.

text: Taking permission from the Administrator for the product to be purchased from vendor.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Administrator Consent for Vendor Purchases

**Description**: As a responsible system, it must ensure that any product purchase from a vendor is completed only after explicit consent is obtained from an authorized Administrator. This promotes accountability and integrity in the procurement process while respecting organizational responsibilities and maintaining trust.

text: Responsible for managing stocks of each product items.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Management of Product Stock

**Description**: As a stock manager, I want to ensure that the stock management system is transparent, secure, and respects user privacy, so that all stakeholders can trust that the product stocks are being managed ethically and responsibly, benefiting both the business and its customers by preventing shortages or surpluses.

text: Keep track of all the payment transactions made by the customers and update the payment information.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Payment Transaction Tracking

**Description**: As a system, I must track all payment transactions made by customers and update the payment information in a manner that ensures transparency, safeguards privacy, and maintains customers' trust. This system will avoid any harm by preventing data breaches, uphold fairness by treating all transactions equally, and promote beneficence by providing accurate and timely updates to benefit the customers.

text: Responsible for contacting the banks for the validation of the a/c number provided by the customer while purchasing and make the transaction from the given a/c.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Ethical Validation and Transaction Processes for Customer Bank Account Details

**Description**: As a responsible organization, we must ensure that the process of contacting banks for the validation of the customer's bank account number during a purchase, and making the transaction from the given account, adheres to ethical principles. This includes maintaining the privacy of the customer's personal data, ensuring transparency in how their information is used, and guaranteeing that the process is fair and free from discrimination. The organization must act with integrity, avoid causing any harm, and build trust by ensuring secure and effective handling of the transaction. Moreover, we aim to respect the customer's freedom and autonomy throughout the validation and transaction processes.

text: Consult with the Administrator about the payment details of the customers for the updating of the database.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent and Privacy-Respecting Consultation for Payment Details

**Description**: As a system user, I want to consult with the Administrator about the payment details of customers in a manner that is transparent and respects customer privacy, ensuring that their personal data is handled securely and ethically during the database update process.

text: Provide feasible solutions to the customers on their complaints and queries.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Resolution of Customer Complaints and Queries

**Description**: As a customer support team member, I want to ensure that solutions provided to customers' complaints and queries are feasible, transparent, and delivered with integrity. This involves explaining the processes clearly, protecting customer privacy, and ensuring that the solutions offered do no harm, thereby building trust and benefitting the individual as well as society as a whole.

text: The system should require the user to state time when should the doughnut be delivered
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Scheduling of Deliveries

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to transparently require me to state the time for doughnut delivery, ensuring my autonomy in scheduling. This guarantees I can receive my delivery at a time that respects my convenience and dignity, while the system commits to acting with integrity and reliability.

text: The system is expected to have reasonable short time response. The voter should be able to login and should be able to get response for his requests in 2-3 seconds.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Prompt and Fair System Response for Voters

**Description**: As a voter, I want to log in and receive responses to my requests within 2-3 seconds so that my experience is efficient and fair, ensuring that my access to the system is not hindered and my participation in the voting process is respected. This aligns with the principles of justice and fairness by providing equal treatment to all users, and trust by maintaining the system's reliability and effectiveness.

text: The data transaction between client and server must be encrypted using SSL technology.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Secure Data Transactions

**Description**: As a developer, I want to encrypt data transactions between the client and server using SSL technology, so that users' personal data is protected and their privacy is maintained consistently.

text: All the passwords that are generated or accepted must be stored in database in an encrypted form.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Encrypted Storage of Passwords

**Description**: As a developer, I want all passwords that are generated or accepted to be stored in the database in an encrypted form, so that users' privacy and security are protected, maintaining their trust and upholding justice and fairness by preventing unauthorized access and potential misuse of sensitive information.

text: To prevent attacks the system should generate random word and ask the user to enter it correctly for multiple tryings.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Secure User Verification through Randomized Challenges

**Description**: To maintain user trust and uphold privacy, the system should employ a method of generating random words that users need to enter correctly over multiple attempts. This enhances security by preventing potential automated attacks, while ensuring that human dignity is respected by not causing undue frustration or inconvenience to legitimate users. This approach supports the principles of non-maleficence, privacy, and trust by securing user data and preventing malicious exploitation without harming genuine users.

text: The system should warn ECA users about the malfunction of the system.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Warning Users of System Malfunction

**Description**: As a user of the ECA system, I want to receive timely warnings about any system malfunctions so that I can avoid potential harm or errors, ensuring transparency, non-maleficence, and trust in the system's integrity.

text: The system should be simple to use
ethical_us:
**Title**: User-Friendly System

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to be simple and easy to use, ensuring that my experience is straightforward and free from unnecessary complexity, promoting autonomy and trust in the system.

text: The physician/pharmacist must have a valid user login to access the system.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Secure and Ethical Access for Physicians and Pharmacists

**Description**: As a healthcare system administrator, I want to ensure that only verified physicians and pharmacists with valid user logins can access the system, to maintain patient data privacy, uphold the principles of trust and responsibility, and safeguard against unauthorized access that could lead to maleficence.

text: A failed login will alert the physician/pharmacist.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparency and Security in Access Attempts

**Description**: As an AI system, I will alert the physician or pharmacist in the event of a failed login attempt to enhance transparency and maintain the security of patient data. This will ensure that any unauthorized access attempts are communicated promptly, protecting privacy and building trust in the system.

text: A list of available patients is displayed after login.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Transparent and Secure Display of Patient List

**Description**: As a healthcare professional, I need a transparent and secure system that displays a list of available patients after login, ensuring that patients' personal data is protected and the process is clear and understandable to prevent any unauthorized access. This system must respect patient privacy, uphold the principle of non-maleficence by avoiding any harm, and build trust through responsible and ethical data handling practices.

text: An error message alerts when an invalid patient is entered.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparency and Trust with Clear Error Messages for Invalid Patient Entries

**Description**: As a healthcare software system, it is crucial to alert users with clear, explanatory error messages when an invalid patient is entered, ensuring both transparency and trust. The error message should be understandable, providing enough information to explain the cause and guide the user on how to correct it, without disclosing any sensitive patients' information.

text: Backspace/reset capability is implemented for typing errors.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Implement Backspace/Reset Capability for Error Correction

**Description**: As a user, I want a backspace/reset feature that allows me to correct typing errors to ensure my data entries are accurate and that my interactions with the system reflect my true intentions, upholding my dignity and supporting my autonomy.

text: Selected or specified patient’s information is loaded.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Ethical Access to Patient Information

**Description**: As a healthcare application, patient information should be loaded in a manner that respects patient privacy and maintains data security, ensuring that only authorized personnel have access. This process must demonstrate transparency, responsibility, and trustworthiness to prevent any unauthorized access or misuse of sensitive data.

text: Return to List is available if the patient loaded is not correct.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure User-Friendliness in Patient Data Correction

**Description**: As a user of the healthcare system, I want to have the option to return to the patient list if the loaded patient data is incorrect, so that I can easily correct any mistakes without compromising my workflow or patient privacy. This helps to uphold user autonomy by facilitating efficient navigation and ensuring data accuracy without causing undue harm or frustration.

text: Navigation to each selected tab.
ethical_us:
**Title**: User-Controlled and Transparent Navigation 

**Description**: As a user, I want to navigate to each selected tab with clear and understandable feedback, ensuring that the process is transparent and respects my freedom and autonomy by allowing me to control my interactions with the system.

text: The font will be larger enough for easy reading.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Readable Font Sizes for Accessibility
**Description**: As a user, I want the font sizes to be large enough for easy reading to ensure that my experience is accessible and inclusive, respecting my dignity and autonomy.
