This is critical for maintaining trust and fairness, as it prevents discrimination against users with visual impairments.

text: Icons will clearly illustrate the feature it represents.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Clarity in Icon Representation

**Description**: As a user, I want icons to clearly illustrate the feature they represent so that I can easily understand and navigate the system, ensuring transparency and reducing the risk of confusion or misuse.

text: Basic Patient information is showed first.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Prioritization of Basic Patient Information Aligns with Privacy and Transparency

**Description**: As a healthcare application, the system must first display basic patient information in a clear and understandable manner to ensure transparency. This prioritization should also respect patient privacy by ensuring that only necessary data is presented initially, and that sensitive information is protected unless explicitly required and consented to by the patient.

text: Customized information is displayed.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Display of Customized Information

**Description**: As a user, I want the information displayed to be customized to my preferences and needs, ensuring that it is done transparently, without compromising my privacy, ensuring fairness, and maintaining my autonomy and dignity. The customization process should be responsible and should avoid any potential harm, ensuring that the system remains trustworthy and beneficial to me. Additionally, the customization should be sustainable and promote social good.

text: Each entry is shown in full.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparency in Data Presentation

**Description**: Ensure that each entry in the system is shown in full, providing users with a complete and comprehensive view. This promotes transparency and allows users to fully understand the data presented to them, thereby fostering trust and enabling informed decision-making.

text: The text and time/date of a note that has been entered is displayed starting with most recent.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Display Notes by Most Recent with Clarity and Transparency  
**Description**: As a user, I want the text and time/date of my notes to be displayed starting with the most recent, thereby ensuring transparency and ease of access to the latest information entered. By doing so, I can trust that the system is reliably presenting my most recent inputs first, which allows for a clear and understandable review of my activities.

text: New and Delete buttons will allow the physician/pharmacist to add a notation to the patient’s file.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Management of Patient Notations

**Description**: As a physician or pharmacist, I need New and Delete buttons to add and manage notations on a patient's file ethically, ensuring the transparency, privacy, and security of patient data. These functionalities should enable clear and honest reporting while maintaining patient autonomy, dignity, and trust in the system.

text: A description and time/date of each prescription that has been ordered or given is displayed starting with most recent.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Display of Prescription Information 

**Description**: As a healthcare system, we ensure the display of a description and time/date of each prescription that has been ordered or given, starting with the most recent, to promote transparency and uphold patient autonomy, while protecting their privacy and maintaining accuracy for trustworthiness and beneficence.

text: All users of the system shall login using some form of unique identification.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical User Authentication

**Description**: As a user of the system, I want to login using a unique identification method that ensures my privacy and maintains my personal information securely, so that I can trust the system with my data while preventing unauthorized access and ensuring fairness and dignity for all users.

text: All login attempts shall be done so in a secure manner.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure Login Attempts 

**Description**: As a user, I want all my login attempts to be conducted securely, ensuring that my personal data and credentials are protected from unauthorized access and potential breaches, aligning with principles of non-maleficence, responsibility, and trust.

text: The system shall be compatible with the Microsoft Windows Operating System.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure System Compatibility with Microsoft Windows to Promote User Autonomy and Accessibility

**Description**: As a developer, I want the system to be compatible with the Microsoft Windows Operating System to ensure that users have the autonomy to choose their preferred platform, thus promoting accessibility and inclusivity for a diverse user base.

text: The system shall allow the administrator to remove equipment.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Responsible Equipment Management by Administrators

**Description**: As an administrator, I want to have the ability to remove equipment from the system so that I can ensure obsolete, faulty, or harmful equipment is not available to users, thereby maintaining the system's integrity, safety, and relevance.

text: The system shall allow the administrator to install additional distributed location templates.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Ethical Administration of Distributed Location Templates

**Description**: As an administrator, I want to transparently manage and install additional distributed location templates so that all actions are carried out responsibly, ensuring that no harm is done and privacy is upheld. This enables the system to benefit society by maintaining trust and upholding the dignity and autonomy of all users.

text: The system shall allow the administrator to remove physical locations.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparency in Administrator Actions for Location Management

**Description**: As an administrator, I want the system to transparently log and communicate any removal of physical locations, ensuring that the reasons and impacts of these actions are understandable to all stakeholders, thus promoting transparency and trust within the organization.

text: The system shall allow administrators to define negotiation rules for the organization.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Ethical Negotiation Rule Definitions

**Description**: As an administrator, I want to define negotiation rules for the organization in a transparent, fair, and responsible manner, ensuring that these rules do not harm any stakeholders, respect privacy, uphold human dignity, and promote trust within the organization.

text: The system shall give the mediator privileges to schedule location and equipment resources.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Fair Resource Allocation for Mediators

**Description**: As a system, I shall ensure that mediators have the privilege to schedule location and equipment resources transparently and fairly, ensuring that all parties involved have equal access opportunities. This will prevent any form of discrimination and maintain the integrity and trust in the system's resource allocation process.

text: The system shall allow the mediator to negotiate a meeting date.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Negotiation of Meeting Dates by Mediators 

**Description**: As a system, I should enable the mediator to negotiate a meeting date transparently and fairly, ensuring that all parties involved are provided with clear communication and equitable consideration of their schedules and preferences. This fosters trust and respects the dignity and autonomy of all participants.

text: The system shall allow the mediator to solve a date conflict.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Mediator Intervention for Date Conflict Resolution

**Description**: As a system, I shall allow the mediator to solve date conflicts to ensure justice and fairness by providing an impartial resolution, uphold dignity by respecting all involved parties, and build trust by demonstrating reliable conflict resolution processes.

text: The system shall allow the mediator to negotiate a location / equipment.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Negotiation for Location/Equipment Allocation

**Description**: As a mediator, I want the system to allow me to transparently negotiate the location and equipment allocation, ensuring all involved parties understand the terms and conditions fully, thereby maintaining trust and fairness throughout the process.

text: The system shall allow the mediator to solve a location conflict.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Mediator's Role in Location Conflict Resolution

**Description**: As a mediator, I want to ensure that I can resolve location conflicts in a transparent and fair manner, while respecting the privacy and dignity of all parties involved, and maintaining trust and accountability throughout the process.

text: The system shall allow the mediator to send and receive messages from users.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Communication Facilitation for Mediators

**Description**: Ensure that the system allowing mediators to send and receive messages from users adheres to principles of transparency, privacy, and trust. The system should clearly explain how user data is handled, protect user privacy by securing messages, and foster trust by ensuring all communications are safe and confidential.

text: The system shall allow the initiator to view the information of any meetings which they initiated.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent Access to Initiator's Meeting Information

**Description**: As an initiator, I want to transparently view the information of any meetings I have initiated, so that I can maintain clear and informed oversight over the details and outcomes of my engagements.

text: The system shall allow the initiator to cancel any meetings which they initiated.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure User Autonomy by Allowing Meeting Cancellation 

**Description**: As a system, I must allow the initiator to cancel any meetings they have scheduled, ensuring their freedom and autonomy to manage their own time and commitments effectively.

text: The system shall allow the initiator to send and receive messages from users.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Communication Platform for Initiators

**Description**: As a system developer, I want the system to allow the initiator to send and receive messages from users, ensuring the transparency, privacy, and dignity of all participants. This will involve implementing clear communication protocols, safeguarding personal data, and fostering an environment of mutual respect and fairness.

text: The system shall authenticate users at the beginning each session.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical User Authentication

**Description**: As an ethical engineer, I want the system to authenticate users at the beginning of each session to ensure transparency about who is accessing the system, maintain the privacy of user data, and uphold trust by safeguarding against unauthorized access.

text: The system shall allow the user to view their schedule.
ethical_us:
**Title**: User Schedule Transparency and Autonomy

**Description**: As a user, I should be able to view my schedule to ensure transparency in my daily activities and exercise control over my personal time management, thereby preserving my autonomy.

text: The system shall notify the user of any schedule changes.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Timely and Transparent Notification of Schedule Changes

**Description**: As a user, I want to be promptly notified of any schedule changes in a clear and understandable manner, so that my autonomy is respected and I can make informed decisions without any inconvenience.

text: The system shall allow users to send and receive messages.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Secure and Private Communication

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to allow me to send and receive messages with guaranteed privacy, so that my personal information is protected and I can communicate without fear of data breaches or unauthorized access.

text: The system shall request a user response to initiator or mediator messages.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure User Consent for System Interactions

**Description**: As a system, I shall request explicit user consent before responding to initiator or mediator messages to respect user autonomy and privacy, thereby ensuring transparent and responsible communication with the user.

text: The system shall allow the user to modify the date preference set of an already submitted meeting response.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Enable Modification of Date Preferences for Submitted Meeting Responses  

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to allow me to modify the date preference set of an already submitted meeting response, ensuring that my autonomy is respected by giving me the flexibility to adapt my choices, while also maintaining transparency about changes and ensuring the fairness of the process for all participants.

text: The system shall allow the user to modify the location preference set of an already submitted meeting response.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Allow Modification of Location Preferences for Submitted Meeting Responses

**Description**: As a user, I should be able to modify the location preference of an already submitted meeting response in order to maintain my autonomy and ensure that my preferences and circumstances are accurately reflected in the meeting details. This feature should be implemented in a transparent and user-friendly manner, safeguarding my privacy and contributing to a fair system where changes can be made without discrimination or undue inconvenience.

text: The system shall allow the user to modify the equipment requirement set of an already submitted meeting response.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Empower User with Control Over Meeting Equipment Modifications

**Description**: As a user, I want to have the ability to modify the equipment requirements after submitting a meeting response, ensuring my freedom and autonomy to make changes and adjustments as needed without being constrained by the initial submission. This promotes transparency by clearly communicating any updates and supports beneficence by allowing the meeting to adapt to improved or changing circumstances for better outcomes.

text: The system shall allow the user to modify the date exclusion set of an already submitted meeting response.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Modification of Meeting Responses

**Description**: As a developer, I want the system to allow users to modify the date exclusion set of an already submitted meeting response while ensuring that this functionality operates with transparency and fairness. This means users will be clearly informed about how their modified responses are processed and impacted, and the changes must not disadvantage or harm any participants involved. Additionally, user privacy will be protected throughout the modification process, guaranteeing that their personal data remains secure and confidential.

text: The system shall allow the user to change the password.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure and Trustworthy Password Management

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to allow me to easily and securely change my password so that I can ensure the protection of my personal data and maintain trust in the system's integrity.

text: The system shall allow the user to view past attended meetings.
ethical_us:
**Title**: User Rights to View Past Meetings

**Description**: As a user, I want to be able to view the history of my attended meetings so that I can maintain transparency and autonomy over my personal data while ensuring my right to information is respected.

text: The system shall allow the user to view pending meetings.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent Access to Pending Meetings

**Description**: As a user, I want to transparently view all my pending meetings, so that I can stay informed and manage my schedule effectively without any miscommunication or lack of awareness regarding my commitments.

text: The system shall show the meetings to the user in ascending time order by default.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Display Meetings in Ascending Time Order by Default

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to display meetings in ascending time order by default to ensure clarity and ease of understanding, promoting transparency and trust in the system's functionality. This feature will help me efficiently manage my schedule and enhance my autonomy in organizing my time.

text: The system shall allow users to view equipment information.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparency in Viewing Equipment Information

**Description**: As a user, I want to view equipment information in a clear and understandable manner, ensuring the transparency of the data presented and fostering trust in the system's integrity and openness.

text: The system shall allow users to view other users’ information.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Privacy and Dignity in User Information Viewing

**Description**: As a responsible developer, I want the system to allow users to view other users’ information only with explicit consent and under privacy safeguards, to ensure respect for individuals' privacy and dignity.

text: The system shall allow user to specify custom meeting locations.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Promote User Autonomy in Meeting Location Selection

**Description**: As a user, I want to have the freedom and autonomy to specify custom meeting locations within the system, ensuring that I can choose locations that are convenient and suitable for my needs, while the system respects my preferences and privacy. This enhances individual control and aligns with the principles of freedom, autonomy, and dignity.

text: The system shall allow users to view location information.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure User Consent for Viewing Location Information

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to obtain my explicit consent before sharing my location information, ensuring transparency and respecting my privacy.

text: The system shall allow users to search  for available distributed location templates(if any).
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Search Functionality for Location Templates

**Description**: As a user, I want to search for available distributed location templates, ensuring that the system transparently provides accurate and non-discriminatory results while respecting my privacy and maintaining trust. This functionality should avoid causing harm to any user, promote fairness in access to templates, and uphold users' dignity and autonomy.

text: The system shall allow users to view information concerning the available distributed location templates(if any).
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Access to Distributed Location Templates 

**Description**: As a user, I want to view all available distributed location templates in the system to ensure transparency in the data sources and processes I am engaging with. This will help build trust by providing clear and understandable information about the templates available for my selection.

text: The web application shall add no more than 5 seconds of perceivable overhead time to any necessary web and database transaction time.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Minimal Overhead for Efficient User Experience

**Description**: As a developer, I want to ensure that the web application adds no more than 5 seconds of perceivable overhead time to any necessary web and database transactions so that users experience swift and efficient interactions with the system. This meets the ethical principle of dignified and respectful treatment of users by valuing their time and promoting trust through reliable system performance.

text: The system shall utilize HTTPS communication to ensure data confidentiality.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure Data Transmission

**Description**: As a responsible developer, I want the system to utilize HTTPS communication to ensure data confidentiality, so that users' personal data is protected and privacy is maintained during their interactions with the system.

text: User authentication and privileges are defined outside the scope of the sytem by the Microsoft Active Directroy Server.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Ethical Management of User Authentication and Privileges

**Description**: As a responsible system provider, I want to ensure that user authentication and privileges are managed externally by Microsoft Active Directory Server to uphold principles of transparency, privacy, trust, and security. This ensures that user data is handled according to stringent standards and reduces the risk of unauthorized access or misuse within our system.

text: Personal information security is defined outside the scope of the SDMS by the database server.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Secure Handling of Personal Information

**Description**: As a responsible developer, I want to ensure that personal information security is defined and managed effectively by the database server, so that privacy is maintained and users' data is protected against unauthorized access and breaches.

text: Users shall be required to log into the system for all operations except the operations on the login page.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure User Authentication for All Operations 

**Description**: As a developer, I want to ensure that users are required to log into the system for all operations except those on the login page, so that we can maintain security, protect users' privacy, and build trust by securing access to personal and sensitive information while preventing unauthorized usage.

text: The system shall run on Windows Server 2003.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Compatibility with Secure and Supported Platforms

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to run on a secure and up-to-date platform, so that my personal data and privacy are not compromised, and the system remains robust and free from potential harm. This promotes transparency, non-maleficence, and trust by ensuring the system operates in a secure environment.

text: The system shall be compatible with IIS6.0 and above or  Apache 2.0 and above.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring System Compatibility and Inclusivity 

**Description**: To promote fairness and trust in our technology, the system shall be designed with compatibility for both IIS 6.0 and above and Apache 2.0 and above, thereby ensuring diverse user needs and existing infrastructures are respected and supported without bias or exclusion.

text: The system shall display all the products that can be configured.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Product Configuration Display

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to transparently display all the products that can be configured, ensuring that the information provided is clear, accurate, and complete so that I can make informed decisions without any hidden or misleading information.

text: The system shall allow user to select the product to configure.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethically Transparent Product Selection

**Description**: As a user, I want to be able to select and configure a product with clear and understandable options and consequences, so that I can make informed decisions without any hidden information or misleading features.

text: The system shall display all the available components of the product to configure.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Full Transparency of Product Configuration Options

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to display all the available components of the product for configuration so that I can make informed decisions, ensuring transparency and trust in the functionality and options provided.

text: The system shall enable user to add one or more component to the configuration.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Addition of Components to User Configuration

**Description**: As a system, I will enable users to add one or more components to their configuration in a transparent, fair, and responsible manner. I will ensure this process respects user autonomy and privacy, does no harm, and fosters trust by providing clear explanations and maintaining system integrity. The design will also be inclusive, ensuring that all users, regardless of their background, can complete this task without facing discrimination or bias.

text: The system shall notify the user about any conflict in the current configuration.
ethical_us:
**Title**: User Conflict Notification for Transparency

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to notify me about any conflict in the current configuration so that I can understand and address potential issues transparently, ensuring that decisions made by the system are clear and comprehensible.

text: The system shall allow user to confirm the completion of current configuration.
ethical_us:
**Title**: User Confirmation of Configuration Completion 

**Description**: As a user, I want to have the ability to confirm the completion of my current configuration to ensure transparency, autonomy, and trustworthiness by verifying that my actions are accurately recorded and acknowledged by the system.

text: The system shall display detailed information of the selected products.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent and Understandable Product Information Display

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to display detailed and clearly understandable information about selected products, so that I can make informed choices without ambiguity about the product's features, benefits, and potential limitations. This transparency will help me trust the information provided and avoid any potential harm from making uninformed decisions.

text: The system shall provide browsing options to see product details.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Product Information Browsing

**Description**: As a user, I want to browse product details transparently, with all relevant information clearly explained and easily accessible, so I can make informed decisions about my purchases.

text: The system shall display detailed product categorization to the user.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent and Detailed Product Categorization

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to display detailed product categorization that is understandable and transparent, ensuring that I can easily find and comprehend product information without feeling misled or confused. This will help build trust in the platform by providing clear and accurate information.

text: The system shall enable user to enter the search text on the screen.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Search Input Handling

**Description**: As a user, I want to enter search text on the screen in a manner that ensures my privacy and data security, while ensuring that the search functionality is inclusive, transparent, and designed to avoid any harm or discrimination.

text: The system shall enable user to select multiple options on the screen to search.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Empower Users with Multi-Option Search Capability

**Description**: To uphold the principles of freedom and autonomy, the system shall enable users to select multiple options on the screen for search functionality. This feature will enhance the user's ability to find relevant information efficiently and effectively, contributing to an improved user experience while ensuring their decision-making autonomy is respected.

text: The system shall display all the matching products based on the search.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Fair and Transparent Display of Search Results

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to display all matching products based on my search accurately and without bias, so that I can make informed decisions. The results should be transparent, explaining why certain products are shown and ensuring that no unjust discrimination or unfair prioritization is applied, thus maintaining trust and fairness.

text: The system shall display only 10 matching result on the current screen.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure User Control and Accessibility in Search Results

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to display only 10 matching results on the current screen, to maintain user autonomy and free my navigation from overwhelm. This will ensure a better user experience, uphold digital dignity, and facilitate user trust by providing clear, manageable information.

text: The system shall enable user to navigate between the search results.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Navigation of Search Results

**Description**: As a user, I want to navigate between search results transparently and without bias, ensuring fair and accurate representation of all relevant information while maintaining my autonomy and trust in the system.

text: The system shall notify the user when no matching product is found on the search.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Notification for Unmatched Product Searches

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to clearly notify me when no matching product is found for my search, ensuring transparency in search results and avoiding confusion or frustration. This promotes trust and transparency by keeping me informed about the search process and results.

text: The system shall allow user to create profile and set his credential.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure User Autonomy and Privacy in Profile Creation

**Description**: As a user, I want to be able to create a profile and set my credentials in a secure manner, ensuring my personal data and privacy are protected and my autonomy is respected. This includes clear communication about how my information will be used and stored, and easy-to-understand options for managing my profile settings and credentials.

text: The system shall authenticate user credentials to view the profile.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical User Authentication

**Description**: As a responsible system, the authentication mechanism will ensure that user credentials are verified securely and accurately to uphold privacy, maintain trust, and protect the autonomy of users wishing to view their profiles. This process will be transparent, non-maleficent, and prevent unauthorized access, ensuring users' data dignity is respected.

text: The system shall allow user to update the profile information.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Profile Update Transparency

**Description**: As a user, I want to be fully informed on how my profile information will be used and updated when I make changes, so that I can trust the system and ensure my data is handled responsibly and transparently.

text: The system shall display both the active and completed order history in the customer profile.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Display Order History Transparently and Respect Privacy

**Description**: As a customer, I want the system to display both my active and completed order history in my profile transparently and securely, ensuring that my personal data privacy is maintained, so that I can trustfully track my orders without compromising my personal information.

text: The system shall allow user to select the order from the order history.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Users Can Transparently Access Order History

**Description**: As a user, I want to transparently access and select orders from my order history, so that I can verify my past transactions and maintain trust in the system without compromising my autonomy or privacy.

text: The system shall display the detailed information about the selected order.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent Order Information Display

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to display detailed information about my selected order in a clear and understandable manner so that I can be fully informed about my purchase and have trust in the service's transparency and reliability.

text: The system shall display the most frequently searched items by the user in the profile.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Display of Frequently Searched Items

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to transparently display the most frequently searched items in my profile, so that I can understand and verify how my data is being used and ensure that the system's recommendations are accurate and personalized based on my own activity.

text: The system shall allow user to register for newsletters and surveys in the profile.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical User Registration for Newsletters and Surveys

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to allow me to register for newsletters and surveys in my profile, ensuring that my personal information is handled with transparency and privacy, and used in a way that benefits me without causing harm. The process should be clear and understandable, promoting trust and respecting my autonomy and dignity.

text: The system shall allow user to select the support type he wants.
ethical_us:
**Title**: User Autonomy in Selecting Support Type

**Description**: As a user, I want to have the freedom and autonomy to choose the type of support that best fits my needs, ensuring that my personal preferences and dignity are respected throughout the process. This choice should be presented transparently, and the system must clearly communicate the available options without bias, ensuring fairness and fostering trust.

text: The system shall allow user to enter the customer and product information for the support.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Data Entry for Customer and Product Information

**Description**: As a user, I want to ensure that when entering customer and product information for support, the system handles this data responsibly by guaranteeing privacy, transparency, and trust. The system should clearly communicate how the information will be used, protect the data from unauthorized access, and ensure the data entry process aligns with principles of justice and fairness, treating all customer information with equal integrity and respect. Additionally, the system should be sustainable, minimizing environmental impact through efficient data handling practices.

text: The system shall display the customer support contact numbers on the screen.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Display Customer Support Contact Numbers Transparently

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to transparently display the customer support contact numbers on the screen so that I can easily obtain assistance when needed. This ensures my autonomy by giving me access to necessary resources to resolve issues, promotes trust by showing the organization's commitment to support, and enhances user experience by providing clear and accessible communication channels.

text: The system shall allow user to enter the contact number for support personnel to call.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Handling of Contact Information

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to enable me to enter my contact number for support personnel while ensuring the highest standards of privacy, transparency, and responsibility are maintained. This would involve the system clearly informing me how my contact number will be used, kept secure, and not shared without consent, thus respecting my autonomy, dignity, and fostering trust.

text: The system shall display the online help upon request.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent Access to Help Resources

**Description**: The system shall provide clear and easily accessible online help upon user request, enhancing transparency by offering understandable and readily available support information to users.

text: The system shall display the FAQ’s upon request.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Provide Transparent Access to FAQs

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to display the FAQ section upon request, so that I can easily access and understand all relevant information, ensuring transparency and trust in the system.

text: The system shall maintain customer email information as a required part of customer profile.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Maintain Customer Email Information Responsibly  
**Description**: As a user, I want the system to maintain my email information as part of my customer profile in a transparent, secure, and ethical manner, ensuring my privacy, data security, and trust, and only for the purposes necessary to provide the intended service.

text: The system shall send an order confirmation to the user through email.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent and Reliable Communication of Order Confirmations

**Description**: As a responsible and transparent e-commerce system, I want to ensure that order confirmations are reliably sent to users via email, clearly outlining the details of their order, so that users are kept fully informed, their privacy is safeguarded, and their trust in our service is reinforced.

text: The system shall display detailed invoice for current order once it is confirmed.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Invoice Display for Orders

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to display a detailed invoice for my current order once it is confirmed so that I can transparently see and understand all the charges and details associated with my purchase, ensuring transparency and trust.

text: The system shall optionally allow user to print the invoice.
ethical_us:
**Title**: User Empowerment in Invoice Management

**Description**: As a user, I want the option to print the invoice so that I have the autonomy to choose the most convenient format for my needs while ensuring my decision aligns with principles of sustainability and privacy. This will facilitate trust and respect for my freedom of choice and personal data.

text: The system shall provide shopping cart during online purchase.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Shopping Cart Experience

**Description**: Ensure the online shopping cart system is designed to be transparent and understandable, clearly communicating how items are added, modified, and removed. Uphold non-maleficence by preventing errors that could lead to incorrect charges or loss of user data. Guarantee user privacy and data protection during the cart process. Promote beneficence by providing a seamless and positive shopping experience. Support user autonomy by allowing easy control over the cart contents. Ensure the system is built sustainably with efficient use of resources. Respect user dignity by making the cart interface accessible to all. Ensure justice and fairness by preventing biases and providing equal access and functionality to all users. Build trust by ensuring the cart system functions reliably and securely.

text: The system shall allow user to add/remove products in the shopping cart.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Respectful Management of Shopping Cart Contents

**Description**: As a user, I want the ability to add or remove products in my shopping cart transparently, without interference, ensuring my autonomy and freedom to make purchasing decisions based on accurate, non-misleading product information. This feature will respect my privacy by not tracking my specific shopping preferences without explicit consent and prevent any harm through potential misuse of my data. This aligns with maintaining trust and upholding my dignity during the shopping experience.

text: The system shall display different shipping options provided by shipping department.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Display of Shipping Options

**Description**: As an ethically conscious system, it shall clearly and comprehensibly display all available shipping options provided by the shipping department, ensuring that users understand the differences, costs, and benefits of each option to make an informed decision. This transparency builds trust and supports user autonomy in choosing the most suitable shipping method.

text: The system shall enable user to select the shipping method during payment process.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Fair and Transparent Selection of Shipping Methods During Payment Process

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to let me choose my preferred shipping method during the payment process, ensuring that all available options are presented transparently and fairly, with clear information about costs, delivery times, and any associated environmental impacts. This capability should respect my privacy, avoid any form of discrimination, and maintain the integrity of my choices, thereby ensuring a trustworthy and ethical user experience.

text: The system shall display the shipping charges.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparency in Shipping Charges Display

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to transparently display the shipping charges during the checkout process, so that I can understand the total cost of my purchase without hidden fees, fostering trust and informed decision-making.

text: The system shall display tentative duration for shipping.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Promote Transparency with Shipping Duration Estimates

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to display a tentative duration for shipping, so that I have clear and transparent information about when to expect my order. This will help build trust and ensure effective communication regarding delivery timelines.

text: The system shall allow user to enter the order information for tracking.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Ethical User Input for Order Tracking

**Description**: As a system user, I should be able to enter order information for tracking purposes in a transparent, fair, and secure manner. This ensures that the process is understandable and accountable, maintaining my privacy and trust while avoiding any harm or misuse of my data.

text: The system shall display the current tracking information about the order.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparently Display Order Tracking Information  
**Description**: As a user, I want the system to transparently display the current tracking information about my order in a clear and understandable manner, ensuring that I am always informed about the status of my order and can trust the accuracy of the provided information.

text: The system shall calculate tax for the order.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical tax calculation for orders 

**Description**: The system shall ensure that the tax calculation for an order is performed in a transparent and understandable manner, adhering to all applicable laws and regulations to avoid harm. It should respect users' privacy, maintain accuracy, and ensure fairness and non-discrimination to build trust with users.

text: The system shall display tax information for the order.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent Display of Tax Information

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to transparently display accurate and clear tax information for my order so that I can make informed decisions and understand the financial implications of my purchase.

text: The system shall display available payment methods for payment.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Display of Payment Methods

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to transparently display all available payment methods, ensuring that I have clear and understandable information about my options to make an informed decision. This aligns with the principles of transparency and trust by providing necessary information and clear communication regarding payment choices.

text: The system shall allow user to select the payment method for order.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Payment Method Selection

**Description**: As a user, I want to be transparently informed about all available payment options and their respective terms and conditions, ensuring that my personal data is protected and my freedom and autonomy in choosing a payment method is respected. The system should ensure that no discriminatory practices are involved in the selection process, and all options should be presented fairly and explained clearly to foster trust.

text: The system shall allow user to cancel the order.

Additionally, the cancellation process should protect user data privacy and be designed to sustain trust by demonstrating that the organization values user rights and dignity.

text: The system shall notify the user about any changes made to the order.

text: The system shall enable the user to enter their reviews and ratings.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical Review and Rating Submission

**Description**: As a user, I want to be able to enter my reviews and ratings in a manner that ensures my privacy, transparency, and trust are maintained, while preventing any harm and promoting fairness and responsibility in the evaluation process.

text: The system shall display all the available financing options.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Display of Financing Options  
**Description**: As a user, I want the system to display all the available financing options in a clear and understandable manner, ensuring transparency so that I can make well-informed decisions about my financial choices.

**Title**: Ensure Ethical Financing Option Selection

**Description**: As a user, I need to be able to select a financing option in a way that is transparent, fair, and respects my privacy and autonomy, so that I can make an informed decision without being subjected to undue influence or discrimination.

ethical_us:

text: The system shall allow user to view detailed sitemap.

text: The system shall display all the available promotions to the user.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Fair and Transparent Display of Promotions

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to display all available promotions in a transparent and equitable manner, ensuring that no promotion is withheld or prioritized unjustly. This ensures fairness and allows me to make informed decisions, maintaining trust in the system's integrity.

text: The system shall allow user to select available promotion.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Fair Access to Promotions

**Description**: As a user, I want to select from available promotions in a manner that ensures justice and fairness, ensuring that all users have equal access to promotions without any form of discrimination or unfair advantage.

text: The system shall allow user to confirm the purchase.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Transparent and Informed Purchase Confirmation

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to provide a clear and detailed summary of my purchase before confirmation, ensuring that all costs, terms, and conditions are transparently communicated so that I can make an informed and autonomous decision.

text: The system shall enable user to enter the payment information.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure and Transparent Payment Information Entry

text: The system shall provide a uniform look and feel between all the web pages.

text: The system shall provide a digital image for each product in the product catalog.

Additionally, ensure that all images comply with privacy regulations and do not infringe on individual rights or copyrights, aligning with principles of dignity, responsibility, and transparency.

text: The system shall provide use of icons and toolbars.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Accessibility and Clarity in User Interfaces Using Icons and Toolbars

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to employ clear, easily understandable icons and toolbars in its interface so that my experience is intuitive and straightforward. This promotes transparency and enhances the usability of the system, ensuring that users of all backgrounds can navigate and interact with the system effectively and without frustration.

text: The system shall provide handicap access.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure inclusive accessibility for users with disabilities

**Description**: As a development team, we will design and implement the system such that it provides appropriate accessibility features and accommodations for users with disabilities. This effort supports the principle of justice and fairness by ensuring that all users, regardless of physical ability, have equitable access to the system. Additionally, it upholds human dignity by recognizing and respecting the inherent worth of individuals with disabilities.

text: The system shall provide a contractual agreement with an internet service provider for T3 access with 99.9999% availability.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring High Availability Through Ethical Contractual Agreements

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to provide a transparent and responsible contractual agreement with an internet service provider that guarantees T3 access with 99.9999% availability, ensuring reliable and trustworthy service while protecting my privacy and upholding principles of fairness and non-maleficence. This also aligns with our sustainability agenda by ensuring efficient and responsible resource use.

text: The system shall provide a contractual agreement with an internet service provider who can provide 99.999% availability through their network facilities onto the internet.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Highly Reliable Internet Connectivity

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to partner with an internet service provider that guarantees 99.999% network availability, ensuring that I can depend on the system to be consistently accessible and reliable. This ensures commitments to trust, non-maleficence by avoiding disruptions and potential harm due to downtime, and responsibility by holding the providers accountable for delivering high availability. Additionally, such reliability supports the users' freedom and autonomy by ensuring they can use the system as needed without interruptions.

text: The product shall be based on web and has to be run from a web server.

**Title**: Ensure Web-Based Product Accessibility and Transparency

This will support users in understanding and trusting the technology, while maintaining accountability.

text: The product shall take initial load time depending on internet connection strength which also depends on the media from which the product is run.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Initial Load Time Dependent on Internet Connection

**Description**: I want the product to transparently communicate its initial load time, which varies based on the strength of the internet connection and the media from which it is run, to ensure users are well-informed and understand the factors affecting their experience.

text: The performance shall depend upon hardware components of the client/customer.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Equitable Performance Across Different Hardware

**Description**: As an organization, we want our AI solutions to perform equitably across different hardware configurations to ensure that clients with varying hardware capabilities can achieve consistent and fair results, promoting justice and fairness.

text: The system shall use secure sockets in all transactions that include any confidential customer information.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure Communication for Confidential Information

**Description**: As an ethical requirement, the system shall utilize secure socket layers (SSL) for all transactions involving confidential customer information. This ensures the privacy and security of the data, fostering trust, protecting the dignity of individuals, and adhering to non-maleficence by preventing unauthorized access or harm.

text: The system shall automatically log out all customers after a period of inactivity.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Automatic User Logout for Security and Privacy

**Description**: As a responsible and transparent service provider, I want the system to automatically log out all customers after a period of inactivity to ensure the privacy and security of user data, thereby preventing unauthorized access and maintaining user trust.

text: The system shall confirm all transactions with the customer’s web browser.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Confirmation of Transactions through Customer's Web Browser

**Description**: To ensure transparency and maintain trust, the system will confirm all transactions with the customer’s web browser, providing clear and understandable communication to the user for every transaction conducted. This measure will also support the principles of responsibility and accountability, as users will be aware of the actions performed and can verify their integrity.

text: The system shall not leave any cookies on the customer’s computer containing the user’s password.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Protect User Passwords Through Cookie Management

**Description**: As a responsible developer, I want to ensure that the system does not leave any cookies on the customer's computer containing the user's password, so that the privacy and security of user credentials are maintained, thus upholding the principles of privacy, non-maleficence, and trust.

text: The system shall not leave any cookies on the customer’s computer containing any of the user’s confidential information.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure Cookie Management

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to ensure that no cookies left on my computer contain any of my confidential information, so that my privacy and personal data are protected, ensuring trust and respect for my dignity.

text: The customer’s web browser shall never display a customer’s password.  It shall always be echoed with special characters representing typed characters.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure Display of Customer Passwords 

**Description**: As a web application, I shall ensure that a customer's password is never displayed in plain text on the web browser. Instead, it shall be echoed with special characters (e.g., asterisks) representing the typed characters to protect the customer's sensitive information and preserve their privacy and security.

text: The customer’s web browser shall never display a customer’s credit card number after retrieving from the database.  It shall always be shown with just the last 4 digits of the credit card number.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Protect Customer Credit Card Information

**Description**: As a user, I want to ensure that my credit card number is never fully displayed on any web browser after retrieval from the database, showing only the last 4 digits, so that my financial information remains secure and my privacy is respected.

text: The system’s back-end servers shall never display a customer’s password.  The customer’s password may be reset but never shown.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure User Password Confidentiality

**Description**: As a developer, I want to ensure that the system's back-end servers will never display a customer's password, to maintain user privacy and trust. The system should allow for password resets without showing the actual password, thus protecting user data and adhering to privacy and non-maleficence principles.

text: The system’s back-end databases shall be encrypted.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Encryption of Back-End Databases

**Description**: As a systems engineer, I want the back-end databases to be encrypted so that the data privacy of users is safeguarded and trust is built by ensuring data security.

text: The system shall allow the user to register for an account from any page in the system.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ethical and Accessible User Registration

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to allow me to register for an account from any page while ensuring my data privacy and security, upholding my dignity, and providing a transparent, fair, and trustworthy registration process.

text: The system will use a single password per user to login to the E-Store System.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Secure and Private User Authentication for E-Store System

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to use a single, secure password for login to the E-Store System, ensuring that my personal information remains private and protected from unauthorized access. This promotes user trust, respects privacy, and upholds the principle of dignity by recognizing and guarding the intrinsic worth of personal data.

text: The system shall use secure socket layer (SSL) technology to ensure all payments made online and user logins are secure.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Secure Transactions and User Logins

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to enforce secure socket layer (SSL) technology for all online payments and user logins to protect my personal and financial information, ensuring privacy and building my trust in the system.

text: Any page of the application should not take more than 6 seconds to load on a DSL broadband connection.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Optimal Page Load Time for Enhanced User Experience

**Description**: Given the principle of beneficence, the application should ensure that any page does not take more than 6 seconds to load on a DSL broadband connection to provide a smooth and efficient user experience, thereby benefiting users by saving their time and reducing frustration. Additionally, this supports the principle of dignity by respecting the users' time and maintaining their trust in the application's reliability and performance.

text: The system may be throttled or slowed down on heavy loads to ensure service for everybody. By throttling is meant that certain functionality may be unavailable during heavy server load.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Service Availability through Load Management 

 **Description**: As an ethical AI system, I should throttle or slow down during heavy loads to ensure equitable service for all users. By temporarily making certain functionalities unavailable during peak times, I aim to maintain overall service stability and fairness, thus promoting trust and achieving justice and fairness among all users.

text: The application should be able to support 100 concurrent users without any performance degradation.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Fair and Reliable Access for All Users

**Description**: As a responsible developer, I want the application to support 100 concurrent users without any performance degradation to ensure fairness and reliability, thereby maintaining user trust and dignity by providing a seamless experience for all users equally.

text: The system should be able to scale up to 500 concurrent users (if there is a need in the future) by installing additional hardware components.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Scalable and Ethical Resource Utilization

**Description**: As a responsible organization, we want the system to scale up to 500 concurrent users by installing additional hardware components, ensuring that this expansion is done sustainably, efficiently, and without compromising user privacy or trust, so that we can meet user demands ethically as they grow.

text: The MTBF (if any) should not be less than 2 months.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure System Reliability 

**Description**: As a developer, I want to ensure that the Mean Time Between Failures (MTBF) of the system is not less than 2 months to build trust with users by guaranteeing system reliability, thus preventing disruptions and potential harm. This commitment to reliability also aligns with principles of responsibility and non-maleficence by minimizing risks and ensuring the system functions effectively for extended periods.

text: A secure server will be required to ensure confidentiality of customer’s credit card and other details.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Customer Data Confidentiality

**Description**: As a responsible technology developer, I want to implement a secure server infrastructure to ensure the confidentiality of customers' credit card and other personal details, thereby upholding their right to privacy and protecting them from potential harm.

text: The user interface of the system should be very user friendly.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure User-Friendly Interface for All Users

**Description**: As a developer, I want to design and implement a user interface that is intuitive, accessible, and user-friendly for all potential users, including those with disabilities, to ensure fairness and dignity, promoting autonomy and trust in the system.

text: It should not take more than 120 seconds for a new user to register for an account.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Quick and Fair User Registration

**Description**: As a user, I want the account registration process to take no more than 120 seconds, ensuring the system is designed to be efficient and accessible for all users, while respecting their dignity and ensuring justice and fairness in the way data is collected and processed.

text: It should not take more than 90 seconds for a registered user to place an order.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Timely and Efficient Order Placement for Registered Users

**Description**: As a registered user, I want the order placement process to be completed within 90 seconds to respect my time and ensure a smooth, efficient, and frustration-free experience, thus maintaining trust and enhancing my autonomy.

text: The system should be easy enough to maintain that someone else could do it with a manual and a few hours training.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Maintainability Through Clarity and Simplicity

**Description**: As a developer, I want to design the system to be easy to maintain with clear documentation and minimal required training, so that it promotes transparency, responsibility, and trust by ensuring that future maintainers can understand and upkeep the system effectively and efficiently.

text: The system should be portable to various operating environments.
ethical_us:

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to be portable to various operating environments to promote fairness and justice by ensuring equal access to technology regardless of the platform. This portability should also maintain transparency in system operations, protect user privacy by complying with different regulatory standards, and promote sustainability by optimizing performance across different environments.

text: Registered User must be able to maintain his/her session information for at least 60 minutes of inactive session before the system prompts him to log out of the system. The registered user must be provided with all the options of the E-store regardless of the time when he/she logs in.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure and Continuous Session Management

**Description**: As a registered user, I want my session information to be maintained for at least 60 minutes of inactivity without being prompted to log out, while ensuring my privacy and security are not compromised. Furthermore, I must have access to all E-store options upon logging in, ensuring fair and equal opportunity to utilize the system regardless of the time. This supports autonomy by allowing me to manage my activities without unnecessary interruptions.

text: The entire website must be user-friendly and easily navigable. The website must be provided with a site map for quick access to a particular link according to the requirement specification. The user must be able to find what he/she wants from the site without any difficulty. The website must adhere to branding schemes and the layout of the web pages must be uniform throughout
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Website Usability and Accessibility

**Description**: As a user, I need a website that is user-friendly, easily navigable, and includes a site map, so that I can find what I need without difficulty. This improvement should respect branding schemes and maintain a uniform layout to ensure consistency, ease of use, and enhance my experience, thereby respecting my time and dignity, ensuring fairness and building trust in the platform.

text: The system shall support up to 10000 simultaneous users against the central database at any given time and up to 5000 simultaneous users against the local servers at any one time. The performance of the website must be optimal incase of huge loads and hence appropriate load balancing must be done to achieve this. There can be any number of mirror servers readily available in case of huge loads without the user getting any delay.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Optimal Performance and Reliability for High User Load

**Description**: As an ethical requirement, the system must support up to 10,000 simultaneous users accessing the central database and up to 5,000 simultaneous users accessing local servers without compromising performance, through the implementation of appropriate load balancing and availability of mirror servers. This addresses principles of non-maleficence by avoiding user frustration and potential data loss due to poor performance, and trust by ensuring consistent, reliable access to the service.

text: The website must provide highest degree of security to the registered users. All the transactions that are made must be secured. The sensitive information passed to and from the website must be secured. Identity theft and other security related issues must be solved. Unauthorized transmission of sensitive information of the user to third party websites for reference must be avoided. On the basis of user agreement the information must be processed. All the information about the registered user must be securely stored in the central database.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Maximum Security for Registered Users

**Description**: As a responsible website, we must provide the highest degree of security to our registered users. This includes securing all transactions, safeguarding sensitive information during transmission, and preventing identity theft and other security-related issues. Unauthorized transmission of sensitive user information to third parties must be avoided, and data processing should only occur based on user agreement. All user information must be securely stored in the central database to ensure privacy and build trust.

text: The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. 90% of new users shall be able to start the display of Events or Activities within 90 minutes of using the product.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Product Usability and Inclusiveness

**Description**: The product shall be designed to be intuitive and self-explanatory to ensure accessibility for all users. This aligns with the principles of dignity and autonomy by respecting the worth of all users and enabling them to navigate the system independently. The goal is that 90% of new users will be able to start displaying Events or Activities within 90 minutes of first using the product, ensuring a fair and user-friendly experience.

text: The system shall be intuitive and self explanatory.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure System Intuitiveness and Explainability

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to be intuitive and self-explanatory so that I can easily understand and navigate it without confusion, thereby promoting transparency and trust in the technology.

text: The product shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the realtor community.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Understandability in Communicating with Realtors
**Description**: As a product developer, I want to ensure that the symbols and words used in the product are naturally understandable by the realtor community, in order to promote transparency and effective communication, thereby helping realtors to perform their roles efficiently and without confusion.

text: The system shall be intuitive to the Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Intuitive System for Program Administrators and Nursing Staff

**Description**: As an ethical requirement, the system should be designed to be intuitive for Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members. This ensures they can efficiently navigate and utilize the system without confusion or errors, promoting transparency, trust, and responsibility while safeguarding dignity by respecting their time and expertise.
